translation: 未来科技部的门解锁了...

original: You note the map down in your Pip-Boy.
translation: 你将地图记在了你的哔哔小子上。

original: Markers are either not linked or in the wrong order! Link the ground marker first, then the top!
translation: 标记要么没有连接，要么顺序错误！请先连接地面标记，再连接顶部标记！

original: These must be the hand radios Francine asked for. I should bring them back to her.
translation: 这些一定是弗朗辛要的手持对讲机。我应该把它们还给她。

original: It's a pair of hand radios. I have no need for them.
translation: 这是一对手持对讲机。我不需要它们。

original: The door is destroyed, and still won't budge.
translation: 门被破坏了，但仍然纹丝不动。

original: You take a look around, but there is no lock attached to this door.
translation: 你环顾四周，没有在这扇门上发现锁。

original: Entering the hole will take you on an adventure that you won't be able to return from until its ending. It is best to enter well prepared.|Venture forth.|Go back.
translation: 进入这个洞将带你踏上一段无法返回的冒险之旅，直到它结束。最好做好充分准备再进入。|勇往直前。|返回。

original: This grotesque shape of roots is what was formerly known as Ethan James. By merging with the host he has become one with the system, granting him full control.
translation: 这些奇形怪状的树根曾被称为伊桑·詹姆斯。通过与宿主的融合，他已成为系统的一部分，并赋予了他完全的控制权。

original: Note to Maintenance: The electrical lock will automatically trigger upon hitting the box, accidentally locking out staff. Please take a look at it.
translation: 给维修部的便条：注意电锁可能会在撞到盒子时自动触发，意外将员工锁在外面。请检查一下。

original: [Luck [%]/8] You break the box, but luckily it seems that the gate is opening.
translation: [幸运 [%]/8] 你损坏了盒子，但幸运的是，门似乎正在打开。

original: [Luck [%]/8] Unsurprisingly, the box is now broken.
translation: [幸运 [%]/8] 不出所料，盒子现在已经坏了。

original: [Repair [%]/75] The machinery below starts to rumble, and the gate is opening.
translation: [修复 [%]/75] 下面的机器开始隆隆作响，门正在打开。

original: [Repair [%]/75] You can't make heads or tails out of this ancient wiring.
translation: [修复 [%]/75] 你对这些古老的电线毫无头绪。

original: it's in chinese.\n\nResponse regarding Directive order. Facility is publicly researching weaponry for the US military, but is covertly performing biological research with the purpose of prolonging life. As their breakthrough is imminent I have acted according to mission. Facility has been sabotaged and data has been sent in the attached file. As the facility is deemed not critical to the Directive, the agent will hereby be relieved of their post.
translation: 这是用中文写的.\n\n关于对组织命令的回应。该设施表面上公开为美国军方研究武器，实际上秘密进行着延长寿命的生物研究。由于他们的研究突破即将到来，我已经按照任务采取行动。研究设施已被破坏，研究数据也已发送至附加文件中。由于该设施被视为对组织不重要，特工将因为这次行动被解除其职位.

original:
The abolishment of the ethicality clause in the employment agreement and the company policy didn't bother me at first, because just like Ethan I thought it was merely a hindrance of true progress.

After the closure of the dome and the "Guest Workers" arrived, I started to get skeptical. We agreed to be confined into this shelter, but these poor people are here against their will! I tried to tell Ethan otherwise but he just said that they would prove to be useful "subjects".

Red flags all around, and sure enough they were subjected to one experiment after another. They were mostly left to their own devices doing menial labor around the facility, but we would constantly put various solutions into their food and water, subjecting them to spores and the like. I'm not fond of this at all, and I'm gonna take this up with Ethan, once and for all. I know Jerry and Francine's got my back, let's see how it goes.
translation:
起初，我并不在意雇佣协议和公司政策中对道德伦理条款的废除，
因为就像伊桑一样，我认为所谓道德条款只是真理进步的绊脚石。

但在穹顶关闭后，”客籍工人“们到来，我开始感到不安。
我们自愿被困在这个避难所里，但这些可怜的人却是被迫来到这里！
我试图告知伊桑我的想法，但他却说他们将成为有用的”实验品“。

到处都是危险的信号，果然，他们被迫接受了一个又一个实验。
他们大多被留在设施周围做苦力，而我们却不断在他们的食物和水中加入各种溶液，
让他们暴露于孢子等危险物质之下。
我对此非常反感，所以我打算和伊桑彻底了断这件事。
我知道杰瑞和弗朗辛会支持我，就让我们看看结果如何吧。

original:
2074-06-04
It's finally time. I've been licking the boots of those bloody federal agents for three long years, but now phase two of Project Yggdrasil can finally begin. The construction of the dome went surprisingly smoothly all things considered. Everything turned out exactly how I envisioned it.

I do not expect phase two to go as smoothly seeing as it is highly experimental and dependent on many human factors, but I will push through. This will be my magnum opus, and I simply need to see it to completion.

Exciting times ahead indeed.
translation:
2074-06-04
终于到了这一刻。
我忍辱负重，在那些该死的联邦特工手下舔了三年鞋跟，
但现在，“世界树”计划的第二阶段终于可以启动了。
即使考虑到多方面因素的制约，
穹顶的建设过程还是出乎意料地顺利，一切都按我预想的那样发展。

我并不指望第二阶段能像之前那样一帆风顺，毕竟它高度实验性，
并且依赖于许多人为因素，但我一定会坚持下去。
这将是我的杰作，我必须亲眼看到它完成。

令人激动的时刻正在前方等着我.

original:
2081-04-24
Mark this day, for the research I've dedicated the my life to for the past decades has finally borne fruit... Over the course of countless experiments I've created and discarded myriads of failed hybrids, but now one is beginning to show great promise.

I've produced this success by first incubating a certain strain of Saccharomyces with viral remnants from the Limit 115 project in order to integrate its genetic material into the fungi as a prophage. Then, I inoculated the seeds of a subspecies of Entada gigas with the modified fungi. The germination of the seeds was incredibly fast, and the size and reach of the maturing plant was uncharacteristically large, outgrowing its pot in a matter of days. It shows little sign of ceasing this exponential growth. Its flowers appear to have been modified to produce and release clouds of fungal spores, taking on a reddish hue as a side-effect. I have begun testing the effects of long-term exposure to the spores released by these modified seed pods.
translation:
2081-04-24
铭记这一天，因为我过去几十年所致力的研究终于结出了硕果......
在无数次的实验中，我创造并淘汰了无数失败的杂交体，
但现在，其中一个开始展现出巨大的潜力。

我首先利用来自“极限115计划”的病毒残骸，培育出了一种特定菌株的酵母，
以将病毒基因作为前噬菌体整合到真菌中。
随后，我将这种经过改造的真菌接种到一种巨型海豆亚种的种子上。
种子的发芽速度惊人，成熟植株的生长速度和规模也异常迅速和庞大，几天内就超出了其容器的限制。
这种增长似乎没有停止的迹象。
它的花朵似乎经过改造后能够产生并释放大量因为副作用而略带红色的真菌孢子。
我已经开始测试长期暴露于这些经过改造的豆荚释放的孢子所产生的影响。

The outcome is still uncertain but if things continue as currently the project might fail. 

And the project can NOT fail.

事态急转直下，远比我预料的更加不利。
我原以为只会遇到些许阻挠，但团队中的叛徒数量多到令人发指。

结果仍然不确定，但如果事情继续这样发展下去，这个项目可能会失败。

而这个项目绝对不允许失败！

Jerry's Jottings 01

Never planned to work for West-Tek, but after getting a glimpse of what they're developing, how could I turn an opportunity like this down? Gotta say though, this new workshop seems pretty big compared to how many they've hired.

I'm in charge of getting the material printer up and running. I reckon I can do that.
translation:
杰瑞的随笔 01

我从没想过会在威斯科技工作，但当我看到他们正在开发的东西后，我怎么能拒绝这样的机会呢？
不过话说回来，这个新车间看起来这么大似乎和招聘的人数比起来有点不相称。

我负责材料打印机的安装和运行。我觉得我能行。

original:
By the time you read this letter, I will be dead. If not by the hands of security, then by my own hand. I am a spy for the Chinese Intelligence Ministry and have been on my designated mission from the moment of my birth. My unit's mission is - or rather was, to infiltrate American scientific facilities in order to steal their data and sabotage their progress. You were in other words part of my cover. My love for you and our daughter is immense, but there's this gnawing sensation in the back of my head insisting on me carrying out my mission. And the Directive is telling me that the time to act is now.

I'm sorry, Eric. I'm sorry, Jessica.

I don't expect you to ever forgive me, but know that my love for you was always real.

Goodbye.
translation:
当你读到这封信的时候，我大概已经死了。
如果不是死在安保人员的手中，那便是自我了断。
我是中国情报部门的间谍，从出生的那一刻起，我便肩负着指定好的使命。
我的任务---或者说，曾经的任务---是渗透进美国的科研机构，窃取他们的数据，破坏他们的研究进展。
换句话说，你曾是我掩护自己身份的一部分。尽管我对你和我们的女儿有着无比的爱，
但脑海中总有一个声音在催促我完成我的使命。
而那个指令告诉我，现在是行动的时候了。

对不起，埃里克。对不起，杰西卡。

我不指望你们能原谅我，但请知道，我对你们的爱始终是真挚的。

再见了.

original:
Jerry's Jottings 08

Mr James decided to close off the elevators to the surface. The closure is in the contract and all, sure, but it wasn't scheduled to close until October! Good thing I managed to get my personal belongings shipped in beforehand. I can probably stash them in the maintenance closet on the upper floor.

Dunno what's going on with the upper management, but what I do know is that I should focus on my work. Let's get that printer up and running.
translation:
杰瑞的随笔 08

詹姆斯先生决定关闭通往地面的电梯。这个关闭当然是合同里写的，但原定的关闭时间是十月份！还好我之前就设法把我的个人物品运了进来。我可以把它们藏在楼上的维修间里。

不知道高层管理在搞什么鬼，但我知道的是我应该先专注于我的工作。总之让我们先把打印机启动起来吧。
埃里克·迈耶的车库笔记

original: Figures that the domestic Mister Handy models and Protectrons were easy to crack the software of, but these Sentrybots are anothere deal entirely. Ethan probably won't care about the number of Sentrybots I've bricked so far, but I'll have to cut down on the experiments.\n\nPiece of shit RobCo software...
translation:
家用型巧手先生和保卫者机器人的软件确实容易破解，但这些铁卫兵完全是另一回事。
伊桑大概不会在意我报废了多少台铁卫机器人，但我也不得不减少实验次数了。

妈的，罗科的软件真是一团糟......

original:
Jerry's Jottings 14

Finally got the printer up and running. It's not perfect, especially in the performance efficiency department. Printing just one square foot of material eats 25% of our allotted daily power usage.

Problem is though, we don't have any good protein samples for the DNA cloning of meat. I brought this up with Mr James and he just told me to "solve it". With no access to the outside not any live animals in here, I don't see any other choice but to produce the sample myself...
translation:
杰瑞的随笔14

终于让打印机运行起来了。但它并不完美，特别是在性能效率方面。
仅仅打印一平方英尺的材料就消耗了我们每天配额25%的电力。

不过问题在于，我们没有用于肉类DNA克隆的良好蛋白质样本。
我向詹姆斯先生提出了这个问题，他却只是让我“自己解决”。
既然我们无法接触到外界，也没有活物在这里，
我看除了自己动手生产样本之外，也别无选择......

original:
From: Jeremy.Usher@WestTek.local
Title: Harassment Complaint
I'm very saddened to hear about this, I'll give him a stern talking to. Thank you for letting me know.

/ From: Jessica.Mayer@WestTek.local
/ Title: Harassment Complaint
/ Greetings Mr Usher. I'm writing this message because of complaints about your son's unacceptable behavior on his site of work and also towards me personally. He has repeatedly sent me unwanted advances over company network mail, and according to his coworkers he is often found slacking off and gives harsh responses when reprimanded.
translation:
发件人：Jeremy.Usher@WestTek.local
标题：骚扰投诉
听到这件事我很伤心，我会跟他好好谈谈的。谢谢你告诉我。

/ 发件人：Jessica.Mayer@WestTek.local
/ 标题：骚扰投诉
/ 尊敬的厄舍先生，我写这封信是为了表达我对您儿子在工作场所和对我个人表现出的恶劣行为的严重关切。
他多次通过公司网络邮件向我发送不请自来的挑逗信息，
而且据他的同事说，他经常偷懒，并在受到批评时对他人作出粗暴的回应。
蛋白块代码解读失败通知

original: You try to decipher what's written in the code, but you can't make heads or tails out of it.\n\n<Science 60 Required>
translation: 你试图解读这段代码中的内容，但却一头雾水，完全摸不着头脑。\n\n<需要科学 60>
蛋白块代码解读成功通知

original: [SUCCEEDED] After noticing a few unoptimized lines of code and bad call cycles, you fix them up and push the update to the printer machine. It should now be able to print double the daily amount of cubes!
translation: [成功] 在注意到一些未优化的代码行和不良调用循环后，你修复了它们并将更新补丁推送到了打印机机器里。现在，它应该能够打印出原来打印蛋白块数的两倍！

original:
Brandon disassembled the showers in dorm 4 to start a damn bootleg brewery. He said that he misses home so much that he'd do anything for some maple syrup. Unfortunately there are no maple trees around so he used the closest thing he could find. I'm not too sure about this though, these roots are unlike anything I've seen before. These spores are making me feel kinda funny too...

---------

Okay, Brandon and his crew has been chugging syrup for months now. They're more aggressive than before, and they've started to show discoloration in their veins. I'll continue to monitor the effects of the syrup.

---------

The syrup must've given them a lot of confidence. Brandon has been talking about overthrowing the complex. I don't think they'll succeed but they think themselves invincible. I'm gonna try to stay out of it, see how it goes. They've stopped eating normal rations and gone over to completely be dependant on the root syrup. This is worrying, but intriguing at the same time. I'm sure the scientists have watched them too, since they haven't interfered at all.
translation:
布兰登拆除了4号宿舍的淋浴设备，开设了一个私酿酿造厂。
他说他非常想念家乡，以至于他会为了枫糖浆做任何事情。
不幸的是，周围没有枫树，所以他用了他能找到的最接近的东西。
不过我有点不确定，这些根茎和我以前见过的都不一样。这些孢子也让我感觉有点奇怪......

---------

好吧，布兰登和他的团队已经喝了几个月的糖浆了。他们比以前更加好斗，而且他们的血管开始变色。
我将继续监测糖浆对他们的影响。

---------

糖浆一定给了他们很多信心。
布兰登一直在谈论推翻这个地下设施。我不认为他们会成功，但他们认为自己是不可战胜的。
我打算置身事外，观察情况如何发展。他们已经停止吃正常的口粮，完全依赖根茎糖浆。
这令人担忧，但同时也很有趣。我相信科学家们也在观察他们，因为他们没有对此做出任何干涉。
埃里克·梅耶的求助信息

original:
Hey you. Stranger. I've seen you, skulking about the facility. You seem to be able to handle yourself and have a decently sane mind.

The situation is dire, more dire than anyone can imagine. It is in your best interest to help the facility, in fact it is IMPERATIVE that you do. Critical data loss and contamination leaks are at stake, which in turn means American lives are too.

This terminal has a character limit for messages, so I can't explain the whole situation. I need you to reboot the offline servers downstairs, then enter the Virtual Reality Pod next to this terminal. I will elaborate once you're inside.
translation:
嘿，你。陌生人。我见过你，在设施里鬼鬼祟祟。
你似乎能够照顾好自己，并且有一个相当理智的头脑。

情况危急，比任何人能想象到的都要严重。
为了你自己的利益，也为了这个设施，你必须伸出援手，实际上这是至关重要的。
关键的数据丢失和污染泄漏正悬而未决，而这意味着美国的存续也岌岌可危。

这个终端发的的消息有字符限制，所以我无法解释整体情况。
现在我需要你重启楼下的离线服务器，然后进入这台终端旁边的虚拟现实舱。
等你进去后，我会跟你详细解释。

original:
Project Name: West-Tek Instant Matter Translocation Unit
Product Code: WT-Y65003
Description:
The matter translocator is a tactical node for instantaneous transportation of material such as supplies, ammunition et cetera. Using the translocator for biological material such as food, animals or personnel is not recommended, as the risk of malfunction is increased and could cause disasterous outcomes.

The units are coupled via Type G cable, and can be used both ways with relatively short cooldown. As every usage consumes about 300 MWh of energy, usage should be planned accordingly.
translation:
项目名称：威斯科技即时物质传送单元
产品代码：WT-Y65003
描述：
物质传送器是一个战术节点，用于即时传输物资，如补给品、弹药等。
不建议使用传送器传输生物材料，如食物、动物或人员，因为这会增加故障的风险，并可能导致灾难性的后果。

这些单元通过G型电缆连接，可以在相对较短的冷却时间内双向使用。
每次使用大约消耗300兆瓦时(MWh)的能量，因此应适当规划使用。
原型机:重型特斯拉加农炮

original:
Project Name: West-Tek Heavy Duty Tesla Cannon
Product Code: WT-T36621
Description:
The heavy duty cannon is an upscaled and improved version of the U.S. Gov. Tesla Cannon project, intended for weaponry on battleships or mounting on a tank. The weapon generates power locally via four micro-fusion nuclear power generators, and dispatches it through a frontal nozzle.

The weapon requires a 2 minute period of warming up before it's ready to initiate a firing routine, but can be kept on standby mode after the initial boot. There are fire settings, a long-range beam meant for precise destruction of distant targets, and a wide cone that dispatches any close range personnel and machinery.

Do note that the generators are vulnerable to damage, and should be prioritized with defensive plating (Though do remember to keep enough flow for cooling air flow).
translation:
项目名称：威斯科技重型特斯拉加农炮
产品代码：WT-T36621
描述：
重型特斯拉加农炮是美国政府特斯拉加农炮项目的升级版和改进版，
旨在作为战列舰的武器系统或安装在坦克上。
该武器通过四个微型聚变核能发电机在原地产生电力，并通过正面的喷嘴发射。

武器需要两分钟的时间进行预热，然后才能启动发射程序，但可以在初始启动后保持待机模式。
设计有火力设置，包括用于精确摧毁远程目标的长程光束，以及用于消灭近距离人员和机械的宽锥形光束。

请注意，发电机容易受损，应用防御装甲优先保护（但要记得留出足够的空间供冷却空气流通）。

original:
Project Name: West-Tek Virtual Reality Suspensive Environment
Product Code: WT-T12898
Description:

The Virtual Reality Suspensive Environment is a network of servers connected via terminals and an "Upload Pod" to store personality data. Storing personality data means, in effect, that a person can be kept "alive" within the environment for as long as the network is powered.


//// Can we really use this as a military proposal? It seems more like a personal project. Turn the servers back to their original purpose as soon as possible.
translation:
项目名称：威斯科技虚拟现实环境
产品代码：WT-T12898
描述：
虚拟现实环境是一个由终端和一个“上传舱”连接的服务器网络，用于存储个性数据。
实际上，可以存储个性数据意味着一个人可以在网络通电的情况下在这个虚拟环境中“活着”。

//// 我们真的能把这个用作军事提案吗？这看起来更像是一个私人项目。尽快将服务器恢复到其原始用途。
原型机:威斯科技能量步枪

original:
Project Name: West-Tek Energy Rifle Prototype S
Product Code: WT-S14472
Description:

The Energy Rifle uses a new method of rapid unstable energy generation so charge a strong and fast projectile that upon impact explodes into a large ball of lethal energy. Due to the unstable nature of the generation, attempting to release the projectile too early will cause it to fizzle out and releasing it too late will cause the weapon to overheat and potentially cause severe damage to the user and their surroundings. Handle with utmost care.

The past 13 prototypes have improved damage and energy generation speed massively, but the fatal flaw of unsafe handling has caused rejection as a potential weapon from the U.S. Military.
translation:
项目名称：威斯科技能量步枪原型 S
产品代码：WT-S14472
描述：
能量步枪采用了一种新的快速不稳定能量生成方法来充能强大且快速的弹丸，
这些弹丸在撞击时会爆炸成一个巨大的致命能量球。
由于生成过程的不稳定性，过早释放弹丸会导致其失效，
而过晚释放则会使武器过热，并可能对使用者和周围环境造成严重损害。使用时务必格外小心。

过去的13款原型已经在伤害和能量生成速度上有了大幅提升，但由于存在不安全的致命缺陷，
美国军方拒绝将其作为潜在武器。

original:
West-Tek Corporation
HIGHLY SENSITIVE
CLASSIFIED DATA
------------

In case of an Emergency Maintenance Procedure, let the Reactor Administrator disable the first layer of fail-safe, to limit reactor output and make Reactor Area traversible for personnel This is referred to as STAGE 1. This is done via the Head Transformer Terminal on top end of the transformer head.

Once STAGE 1 is triggered, maintenance personnel can safely enter Reactor Area. A diagnostics terminal will be revealed in the Reactor Area for personnel ease-of-access.
If an emergency fault is found, manual shutdown can be performed from this terminal.

If fault is found with the second tier reactor fail-safe, a Reactor Administrator can initiate STAGE 2 from the Reactor Area terminal.

Once STAGE 2 is triggered, the reactor should absolutely NOT be running. STAGE 2 will de-escalate automatically after 3600 seconds.
translation:
威斯科技公司
高度敏感
机密数据
------------

在紧急维护程序运行的情况下，让反应堆管理员禁用第一层安全装置，
以限制反应堆输出并使反应堆区域可供人员通行。这被称为阶段1。
这个过程是使用位于变压器头部顶端的主变压器终端完成的。

一旦触发阶段1，维护人员就可以安全地进入反应堆区域。
反应堆区域内将显示一个诊断终端，以方便人员操作。

如果发生紧急故障，可以从该终端执行手动关闭。

如果发现第二层反应堆安全装置故障，反应堆管理员可以从反应堆区域终端启动阶段2。

一旦触发阶段2，反应堆绝对不能运行。阶段2将在3600秒后自动降级。

original:
Due to accidental leakage in the Exhaust Relay, it has been decided that the room with the sample valve will be closed off until further notice.

Note to self: The key code needed changing, so I set it as my birthday.

- Gardner
translation:
由于排气继电器发生意外泄漏，已决定关闭装有样品阀门的房间，直至另行通知。

给自己的备注：密钥代码需要更改，所以我将密码设置成我的生日。

- 加德纳

original: Ah ah. The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog. Oh my, it appears to have worked!
translation: 啊哈。这只伶俐的棕色狐狸跳过一只懒惰的狗。哦，看起来有效了！

original: I am ever so thankful to you, dear stranger. Your unfortunate circumstances turned out to be a blessing for me.
translation: 我真是太感谢你了，亲爱的陌生人。你的不幸却成了我的幸运。

original: But we still have the matter of a name to take care of, and I am very interested in your input. What do you think?
translation: 但我们还得处理名字的问题，我很想知道你的想法。你觉得呢？

original: My goodness! Are you quite all right, sir?
translation: 我的天哪！先生，您没事吧？

original: My goodness! Are you quite all right, ma'am?
translation: 我的天哪！夫人，您没事吧？

original: Oh it's you again! I have thought about what you said about names. Do you have a moment?
translation: 哦，又是你！我想过你说的话，关于名字。你现在有空吗？

original: Hello again, how can I help you?
translation: 你好，我能帮你什么忙吗？

original: Hello again, how can I help you?
translation: 你好，我能帮你什么忙吗？

original: Don't tell Pearl we're out here, okay?
translation: 别告诉珀尔我们在这里，好吗？

original: Well this was a waste of time.
I don't think I can get this one open.
Never seen you around before. But you got the door open, and for that I can only thank you. I can finally continue my research.
translation: 以前从没见过你。但你打开了门，我为此感谢你。我终于可以继续我的研究了。

original: I can't believe it, someone's actually down here! Oh, finally, help at last!
translation: 真不敢相信，真的有人在这里！哦，终于，终于来了帮手！

original: You did it! Guess you're not so useless after all.
translation: 你做到了！看来你也不是那么没用嘛。

original: Go on, go get the sample.
Oh grand, the pissant escaped. Oh well. Either way, I have nothing to say to you.
translation: 哦，太好了，那个混蛋逃跑了。哦，好吧。无论如何，我无话可说。

original: I have nothing to say to you. Piss off.
Nice work on the containment. Now, let's discuss the next steps.
translation: 隔离工作干得不错。现在，让我们讨论下一步。

original: Good, good. The situation is under control.
But only here. The virus must've spread and shut down most of the other partitions, since I'm unable to bring them back online.
translation: 但只有这里。病毒肯定已经蔓延并攻陷了其他大部分分区，因为我无法将它们重新上线。

original: I'll let you out before something happens to you too, and I'll answer any questions you might have.
translation: 在你也遇到同样的事情之前，我会放你出去，并回答你可能有的任何问题。

original: Good job. I think we're just about done.
translation: 干得好。我想我们差不多完成了。

original: The pod is still working! Fantastic.
There's no point in the radio if you're literally right here, is it?
translation: 如果你真的就在这里，那无线电就没什么意义了，对吧？

original: You won't get far without me.
What the hell is wrong with you?!
Why would you throw away the life we had?
translation: 为什么你要让我们冒着生命的危险来做这件事？

original: I’ve never heard of such a device in this dome, but I have a terminal set up in my garage with a general catch-all troubleshooting routine.
translation: 我在这个穹顶里从未听说过这样的设备，但我在车库里设置了一个终端，有一个通用的通用故障排除程序。

original: It should, in theory, be able to translate whatever language is on the device.
translation: 理论上，它应该能够翻译设备上的任何语言。

original: Won't know what the device is used for unless I see it for myself though. Where did you find it?
translation: 但除非我亲眼看到它，否则我无法确定这个设备的用途。你在哪里找到的它？

original: Do you know anything about a strange computer device? It shows strange signs when turned on.
translation: 你知道什么奇怪的计算机设备吗？它开启时会显示奇怪的符号。

original: Most of my life has been spent building and reverse engineering strange computer devices. You're gonna have to be a little bit more specific.
translation: 我大部分时间都花在构建和逆向工程奇怪的计算机设备上。你得说得更具体一些。

original: For starters, where exactly did you find it?
translation: 首先，你究竟在哪里找到的它？

original: Do you know anything about a strange computer device?
translation: 你知道一个奇怪的电脑设备吗？

original: Strange device in Chinese huh... Well, I have a few suspicions of what it could be but let me make sure. Where did you find this device?
translation: 那是个中文的奇怪设备对吧......嗯，我对它是什么有些猜测，但让我先确认一下。你在哪里找到这个设备的？

original: Do you know anything about a strange computer device? It was in Chinese but I got it translated.
translation: 你知道一个奇怪的电脑设备吗？它是中文的，但我找人翻译了。

original: Right. Then the device belonged to my, um, wife. No doubt.
translation: 没错。那么，那个设备一定属于我，嗯，我的妻子。毫无疑问。

original: It's a bit of a touchy subject for me, but my wife that I'd known for over 30 years turned out to be a Chinese sleeper agent.
translation: 这对我来说是个敏感话题，但我认识了30多年的妻子竟然是中国潜伏特工。

original: That strange device you found would likely be used to sabotage company equipment. It would seem she opted for not using it, however.
translation: 你发现的那个奇怪设备很可能被用来破坏公司设备。不过，她似乎并没有使用它。

original: She went out with... with a bang, quite literally. Tried to start a meltdown in the reactor, but when that failed she scrambled away.
translation: 她以一种非常直接的方式离开了......试图在反应堆中引发熔毁，但失败后她仓皇逃离。

original: Took a stand in the Exhaust Relay, and promptly got shot down by security bots. Ethan's had the area sealed up since then.
translation: 她站在排气继电器旁，结果被安保机器人迅速击毙。自那以后，伊桑就封锁了那片区域。

original: A pipe burst in the crossfire and caused a severe radiation leak. Any remaining clues towards that device are probably from there.
translation: 交火中一根管道破裂，导致了严重的辐射泄漏。任何与该设备相关的线索可能都来自那里。

original: I found it in a house up in the dome. Number 03.
translation: 我在穹顶内的一所房子里找到了它。编号是03。

original: Doctor Mayer, who set up the network of robotic maintenance units within the dome, was irritated when he couldn’t tell the units apart.
translation: 梅耶博士在穹顶内设置了机器人维护单元网络，但当他无法区分这些单元时，他感到十分恼火。

original: So he altered my voice modulator to output a different pitch.
translation: 于是他改变了我的语音调制器，使其发出不同的音调。

original: You sound a bit different from the other Mister Handy models, why is that?
translation: 你的声音听起来和其他型号的巧手先生有点不同，这是为什么呢？

original: Well, yes... That would be a simpler solution. But I am not in the position to question the decisions of Dr Mayer.
translation: 嗯，是的......那将是一个更简单的解决方案。但我没有资格质疑梅耶博士的决定。

original: And he often preferred the more... Difficult solutions.
translation: 而且他通常更喜欢......更复杂的解决方案。

original: Awfully complicated for something you could just solve with some paint.
translation: 这简直复杂得要命，明明用油漆就能解决的问题。

original: By the time you listen to this tape, I will be dead. If not by the hands of security, then by my own hand.
translation: 当你听到这段录音时，我已经不在人世了。如果不是死于安保之手，便是自我了断。

original: I am a spy for the Chinese Intelligence Ministry and have been on my designated mission from the moment of my birth.
translation: 我是中国情报部的间谍，从我出生的那一刻起，就肩负着指定的使命。

original: My unit's mission is - or rather was, to infiltrate American scientific facilities in order to steal their data and sabotage their progress.
translation: 我的任务是-----或者说，曾经的任务是，渗透进美国科研设施，窃取数据并破坏他们的进展。

original: You were in other words part of my cover. My love for you and our daughter is immense...
translation: 换句话说，你曾是我身份掩护的一部分。我对你和我们女儿的爱是无比深沉的.....

original: ...but there's this gnawing sensation in the back of my head insisting on me carrying out my mission.
translation: ......但脑海中总有一个挥之不去的念头，催促我完成我的使命。

original: And the Directive is telling me that the time to act, is now.
translation: 而指令告诉我，现在就是行动的时候。

original: I'm sorry, Eric. I'm sorry, Jessica.
translation: 对不起，埃里克。对不起，杰西卡。

original: I don't expect you to ever forgive me, but know that my love for you was always real.
translation: 我不指望你们能原谅我，但请知道，我对你们的爱始终如一。

original: Why you're in the West-Tek NBC Division's Nevada Branch Yggdrasil Dome, living and recreation space for the scientists and engineers hard at work.
translation: 你为什么在威斯科技NBC部门内华达分部的世界树穹顶里，这是科学家和工程师们辛勤工作的生活和休闲空间。

original: Any further information is classified unless you prove yourself to be a West-Tek employee or a US Military official.
translation: 除非你能证明自己是威斯科技员工或美国军官，否则进一步的信息都是机密的。

original: Yeah, I'm all right. Where have I ended up?
translation: 是的，我没事。我到底在哪里？

original: This is the maintenance hall for my fellow units. Here I refuel and repair them so they can continue their work in the dome.
translation: 这是我的同伴单位的维护大厅。我在这里为它们加油和修理，这样它们就可以在穹顶内继续工作。

original: This is the maintenance hall for my fellow units. Here I refuel and repair them so they can continue their work in the dome.
translation: 这是我的同伴单位的维护大厅。我在这里为它们加油和修理，这样它们就可以在穹顶内继续工作。

original: While I do not have a name, I am the designated caretaker of the units maintaining the dome facilities.
translation: 虽然我没有名字，但我是穹顶设施维护单元的指定看护人。

original: Are you unwell? Here, let me patch you up.
translation: 你不舒服吗？来，让我帮你包扎一下。

original: As for your question, You are in the West-Tek NBC Division's Nevada Branch Yggdrasil Dome. Living quarters and recreation area for our employees.
translation: 至于你的问题，你在威斯科技NBC部门内华达分部的世界树穹顶内。这是我们的员工宿舍和休闲区。

original: Any further information is classified unless you prove yourself to be a West-Tek employee or a US Military official.
translation: 除非你能证明自己是威斯科技员工或美国军官，否则进一步的信息都是机密的。

original: Damn, that fall hurt. Where am I?
translation: 该死，那次坠落伤得我好重。我在哪里？

original: Pardon, but clearance to military officials is only given through a temporary passcard from the lobby above. Did you miss it, perchance?
translation: 请原谅，但军官通行证只能通过上方大厅的临时通行证获得。你错过了吗，也许？

original: Normally I would have security escort you out, but current circumstances would make that very difficult.
translation: 通常我会让保安带你出去，但目前的情况让这变得很难做到。

original: Seeing as you have no employee pass card, I very much doubt your statement.
translation: 你没有员工通行证，我非常怀疑你的话。

original: Normally I would have security escort you out, but current circumstances would make that very difficult.
translation: 通常我会让保安带你出去，但目前的情况让这变得很难做到。

original: [Lie] I'm a new West-Tek employee, could you show me around?
translation: [说谎]我是新来的威斯科技员工，你能带我参观一下吗？

original: Forgive me sir, but the information on this card does not match with your own profile. Would you kindly return the card to its rightful owner?
translation: 请原谅，先生，但这张卡上的信息与您的资料不符。请您将这张卡归还给它的合法持有人好吗？

original: [Use ID Card] I'm a West-Tek employee, now tell me what's going on here.
translation: [使用ID卡]我是威斯科技公司的员工，现在告诉我这里发生了什么。

original: Forgive me ma'am, but the information on this card does not match with your own profile. Would you kindly return the card to its rightful owner?
translation: 请原谅，女士，但这张卡上的信息与您的资料不符。请您将这张卡归还给它的合法持有人好吗？

original: [Use ID Card] I'm a West-Tek employee, now tell me what's going on here.
translation: [使用ID卡]我是威斯科技公司的员工，现在告诉我这里发生了什么。

original: Goodness gracious, how did you end up all the way down here?
translation: 天哪，你怎么会一路跑到这里来？

original: Normally I would call security and have them escort you out, but current circumstances make that quite difficult.
translation: 通常我会叫保安来带你出去，但目前的情况让这变得很难做到。

original: I'm neither, I just want to get out of here.
translation: 我两者都不是，我只是想离开这里。

original: I see... That is quite unfortunate indeed. Since escorting guests out isn't within my designated tasks, we're going to have to find another solution.
translation: 我明白了......这确实很不幸。由于护送客人离开不是我的指定任务，我们需要找到其他解决方案。

original: This is outside of standard protocol, but I will have to point you towards Francine, lovely young lady who lives nearby.
translation: 这超出了标准程序，但我会指引你去找弗朗辛，一位住在附近的可爱年轻女士。

original: Should you have any additional questions, you can find me in the maintenance hall just over yonder.
translation: 如果你有任何其他问题，你可以在那边不远处的维护大厅找到我。

original: The way I came in was a one way trip, can you help me get out of here?
translation: 我进来的路是条单行道，你能帮我离开这里吗？

original: My.. Well... You may be right. The past hundred years have clearly been abnormal.
translation: 我......嗯......你可能是对的。过去的百年显然是不正常的。

original: Very well. I will ignore standard protocol and engage in free conversation. Cutting the crap, as you so adequately put it.
translation: 很好。我将无视标准程序，进行自由交谈。就像你说的那样，省去废话。

original: Unfortunately I can not help you in finding your way out since it is outside of my jurisdiction and designated zone of operation.
translation: 不幸的是，我无法帮助你找到出路，因为这超出了我的管辖范围和指定操作区域。

original: You should seek out Francine, she lives in the house closest to here, numbered 01. I'm afraid that's the best of help I can offer.
translation: 你应该去找弗朗辛，她住在离这最近的房子里，编号为01。恐怕这是我能提供的最大帮助了。

original: However, if you do have any other questions, I will be happy to answer them to the best of my abilities.
translation: 不过，如果你有其他问题，我会尽我所能回答。

original: I am stationed in the maintenance hall just over yonder.
translation: 我就在不远处的维修大厅里。

original: Cut the crap, robot. Just point me to the exit.
translation: 少废话，机器人。直接告诉我出口在哪里。

original: It is a research facility, and also the life work of West-Tek scientist Ethan James. As to what they research, I do not know.
translation: 这是一个研究机构，也是威斯科技科学家伊桑·詹姆斯的毕生心血。至于他们研究什么，我不知道。

original: The dome is an imitation of life above, constructed in prediction of nuclear armageddon. The research facilities are located below the dome.
translation: 穹顶是地上生活的模仿品，为了预防核末日而建造。研究设施位于穹顶下方。

original: No I meant like, what is the dome?
translation: 不，我的意思是，穹顶是什么？

original: It is a research facility, and also the life work of West-Tek scientist Ethan James. As to what they research, I do not know.
translation: 这是一个研究机构，也是威斯科技科学家伊桑·詹姆斯的毕生心血。至于他们研究什么，我不知道。

original: The dome is an imitation of life above, constructed in prediction of nuclear armageddon. The research facilities is located below the dome.
translation: 穹顶是对上面生活的模仿，建造它是为了预防核末日。研究机构位于穹顶下方。

original: No I meant like, what is the dome?
translation: 不，我的意思是，穹顶是什么？

original: Yes, the Mister Handy is a General Atomics and RobCo brand. Instead of developing our own robotic assistant units, West-Tek merely leased them.
translation: 是的，巧手先生是通用原子和罗伯科的品牌。威斯科技没有开发自己的机器人助理单元，而是租用了它们。

original: And since you're saying "was", I presume that they are no longer operating?
translation: 既然你说“曾经是”，我猜它们现在不再运行了？

original: How come there's Mister Handies here? I thought West-Tek was in competition with RobCo?
translation: 这里怎么会有巧手先生？我以为威斯科技和罗伯科是竞争对手？

original: Yes, the Mister Handy is a General Atomics and RobCo brand. Instead of developing our own robotic assistant units, West-Tek merely leased them.
translation: 是的，巧手先生是通用原子和罗伯科的品牌。威斯科技没有开发自己的机器人助理单元，而是租用了它们。

original: And since you're saying "was", I presume that they are no longer operating?
translation: 既然你说“曾经是”，我猜它们现在不再运行了？

original: How come there's Mister Handies here? I thought West-Tek was in competition with RobCo?
translation: 这里怎么会有巧手先生？我以为威斯科技和罗伯科是竞争对手？

original: I see. A shame, but that also means that the dome served its purpose. Nothing we can do about it, I guess.
translation: 我明白了。很遗憾，但这也意味着穹顶完成了它的使命。我想我们也无能为力了。

original: Well, yeah. A nuclear apocalypse destroyed most of the old world. Sorry to break it to you.
translation: 好吧，是的。一场核末日摧毁了旧世界的大部分地区。很抱歉告诉你这个事实。

original: I see. A shame, but that also means that the dome served its purpose. Nothing we can do about it, I guess.
translation: 我明白了。很遗憾，但这也意味着穹顶完成了它的使命。我想我们也无能为力了。

original: Well, yeah. A nuclear apocalypse destroyed most of the old world. Sorry to break it to you.
translation: 好吧，是的。一场核末日摧毁了旧世界的大部分地区。很抱歉告诉你这个事实。

original: I... I can't say I've ever thought about it. Let me think about it, maybe I'll come up with something.
translation: 我......我曾经想过这个问题。让我想想，也许我能想出点什么。

original: Do you want a name though?
The tree has many functions, but mainly it is providing structural support as a pillar to hold the weight of the dome.
translation: 这棵树有许多功能，但主要是作为支柱提供结构支撑，以承受穹顶的重量。

original: Ethan is quite the visionary so instead of a regular pillar, he demanded that there would be a giant tree instead.
translation: 伊桑很有远见，所以他要求不要普通的柱子，而是一棵巨树。

original: As to the reason why, I do not know.
The tree has many functions, but mainly it is providing structural support as a pillar to support the weight of the dome.
translation: 这棵树有很多功能，但主要是作为支柱提供结构支撑，以支撑穹顶的重量。

original: Ethan is quite the visionary so instead of a regular pillar, he demanded that there would be a giant tree instead.
translation: 伊桑很有远见，所以他要求不要普通的柱子，而是一棵巨树。

original: As to the reason why, I do not know.
I'm um... I am... My name is Francine Connolly. Sorry, I haven't spoken with anyone for quite some time. Forgive me for being forgetful.
translation: 我......嗯......我是......我叫弗朗辛·康纳利。抱歉，我已经很久没有和人说话了。请原谅我的健忘。

original: Who are you, stranger? How did you end up in these accursed depths, and why?
translation: 你是谁，陌生人？你怎么会来到这被诅咒的深处，又是为什么？

original: The roots envelop me, I've become one with the roots. The roots keep me alive, but they also keep me... well, rooted.
translation: 树根将我包裹，我与树根合为一体。树根维持着我的生命，但它们也让我......嗯，扎根于此。

original: The roots came from below, it's part of a... a lab-grown viral infection.
translation: 这些树根来自地下，它们是......一种实验室培养病毒感染的一部分。

original: I don't... I'm not... I don't know if you can really call an existence like this "being alive". I'm infected, you see.
translation: 我......我......我不知道你是否真的能把这样的存在称为“活着”。我被感染了，你看。

original: The roots nourish me, keep me from passing on. My body is stuck, whether I like it or not.
translation: 树根滋养着我，让我无法解脱。我的身体被困住了，无论我是否愿意。

original: So the caretaker is still functioning? That's surprising, I thought the others... Nevermind.
translation: 所以，看护人还在工作吗？这太令人惊讶了，我以为其他人......算了。

original: It's been a good while since I went outside, but yes most employees in this West-Tek hellscape know where the exit is.
translation: 我已经很久没有出去了，但没错，这个威斯科技地狱里的大多数员工都知道出口在哪里。

original: Problem is, nobody was authorized to leave. Ethan called it a safety precaution, both because of the war and because of the work we did.
translation: 问题是，没有人被授权离开。伊桑称之为安全预防措施，既是因为战争，也是因为我们的工作。

original: Not that it matters to me now, anyway. I can't move even if I wanted to.
translation: 不过这对我现在来说也没什么意义了，反正我也动不了。

original: The way out runs through the tree. The... There's an elevator there. You'd need to get below ground first though. Into the complex itself.
translation: 出去的路要经过一棵树。那...那里有个电梯。不过你得先下到地下去。进入建筑群内部。

original: But before you go, could you perhaps... do me a favor?
translation: 但在你走之前，你能不能......帮我一个忙？

original: A robot pointed me this way, said you might know the way out of here.
translation: 一个机器人指引我到这里来，说你可能知道离开这里的路。

original: I'd like to help you get out of here, I really do. I can't do more than talk to you though. And I've got an idea.
translation: 我想帮你离开这里，我真的想。但我只能和你说话。我有个主意。

original: My, um, son... used to have these pairs of hand radios he used to play with. I'm not sure where they are but if you bring me one...
translation: 我，嗯，我儿子......以前有些成对的手持对讲机，他以前经常玩。我不知道它们在哪里，但如果你给我带来一个......

original: ...We could stay in contact. I could guide you and give you advice through that.
translation: ......我们可以保持联系。我可以通过它引导你并给你建议。

original: Great! His room is downstairs, just across the kitchen. If they're not there, they might be in the shack by the lakeside. He liked playing there.
translation: 太好了！他的房间在楼下，就在厨房对面。如果它们不在那里，那可能在湖边的小屋里。他喜欢在那里玩。

original: Sure, I'll see what I can do.
translation: 当然，我会看看我能做什么。

original: I see... Well, if you change your mind I'll... still be here, haha...
translation: 我明白了......好吧，如果你改变主意了，我......还会在这里，哈哈......
不用了，谢谢，我宁愿不要。

original: He's... He's dead. I'd prefer if you didn't ask more about him.
translation: 他......他已经死了。我希望你不要再问他的事了。

original: I... Yeah, but can you blame me? I've been stuck in these roots for God knows how long!
translation: 我......是的，但你能怪我吗？我被困在这些树根里，天知道有多久了！

original: I didn't even WANT to be stuck in this damn dome but my husband insisted it was the "opportunity of a lifetime"!
translation: 我甚至不想被困在这个该死的穹顶里，但我丈夫坚持说这是“千载难逢的机会”！

original: Well thanks to that I had to watch my entire family die one by one, whilst I alone was left behind. And now I'm even unable to pass on myself...
translation: 好吧，多亏了它，我不得不眼睁睁看着我的家人一个接一个地死去，而我却被独自留下。现在，我甚至无法让自己解脱......

original: Ah, sorry... What were we talking about? The hand radios, right. Would you get them for me?
translation: 啊，对不起......我们刚才在说什么？手持对讲机，对吧。你能帮我拿一下吗？

original: You really just want someone to talk to, is that it?
translation: 你只是想找个人说话，对吧？

original: That's them! You can place one here, and I'll answer whenever you call with the other one. I'll try to answer any questions you come across.
translation: 就是它们！你可以在这里放一个，然后用另一个随时联系我。我会尽量回答你遇到的任何问题。

original: Or you could even call if you just... want to talk.
translation: 或者，如果你只是......想聊天，你也可以打给我。

original: And sorry for the poor first impression I might have given. It's been years since I've spoken to anyone, and you caught me by surprise.
translation: 还有，我为可能给你留下的不佳第一印象道歉。我已经很多年没和人说话了，而你突然出现了。

original: Are these the radios you were asking for?
translation: 这些就是你要的无线电吗？

original: It's essentially a... a giant bomb shelter with an attached laboratory.
translation: 它本质上是一个......一个巨大的防空洞，附设了一个实验室。

original: Ethan sought a place hidden from prying eyes... A place for his research.
translation: 伊桑找了一个隐藏的地方......一个供他研究的地方。

original: He invited West-Tek bioscientists and their families, planning to continue his work no matter what happened to the outside world.
translation: 他邀请了威斯科技生物科学家及其家人，计划无论外界发生什么，都要继续他的工作。

original: Oh... Oh my, that's quite unfortunate. I'm sorry but given my current... state, I'm afraid I can't be of much help.
translation: 哦......哦，天哪，这真不幸。我很抱歉，但鉴于我目前的......状态，恐怕我帮不上什么忙。

original: I'm [%], I kind of fell into the dome by accident.
translation: 我是[%]，我意外地掉进了穹顶。

original: Oh that tunnel. That's where we got our food and other necessities from. I've never been into the tunnel myself though.
translation: 哦，那条隧道。我们从那里获取食物和其他必需品。但我自己从没进过那条隧道。

original: Only Jerry and Ethan were allowed in, but I think there's a small factory and some other machines inside. Jerry kept his guns in there too.
translation: 只有杰瑞和伊桑被允许进去，但我想里面有一个小工厂和一些其他机器。杰瑞还把他的枪放在那里。

original: Jerry used to live in number five. That's um, the house with the clinic. His wife Joyce was the doctor and he handled food distribution.
translation: 杰瑞以前住在五号。那是......有诊所的房子。他的妻子乔伊斯是医生，他负责食物分配。

original: Your best bet to find a code to the tunnel keypad is probably in that house.
translation: 你最好在房子里找到隧道键盘的密码。

original: I found a keypad by the big tunnel at the end of the road. Do you know the code?
translation: 我在路尽头的大隧道旁找到了一个键盘。你知道密码吗？

original: Well, yeah? Everybody sleeps, believe it or not. Even immortal mutants entangled in giant roots.
translation: 嗯，是吗？信不信由你，每个人都会睡觉。就连被巨大树根纠缠的不死变种人也会睡觉。

original: I'll do my best to properly wake up before responding next time.
translation: 我下次回复前会尽量先醒过来的。

original: Um... Better now that I have someone to talk to. Not like I want to force you to stay or anything, I have every intention to help you find a way out.
translation: 嗯......现在有人和我说话感觉好多了。我不想强迫你留下来或什么的，我有意帮你找到出路。

original: Thanks for asking though, it means a lot.
translation: 不过还是要谢谢你问，这对我来说意义重大。

original: I'm doing fine. Nothing new on my end. Thanks for checking in on me.
translation: 我很好。我这边没有什么新情况。谢谢你来关心我。

original: As good as I can, thank you. Hope you're doing well, too. Good luck in your search.
translation: 我尽可能做到最好，谢谢你。希望你也一切都好。祝你在搜索中好运。

original: Nice, communications all set up! So, did you have any questions?
translation: 太好了，通信都设置好了！那么，你有什么问题吗？

original: Yep, I can hear you just fine.
translation: 是的，我能清楚地听到你。

original: What? Why? Just speak normally like it's a telephone, silly.
translation: 什么？为什么？就像打电话一样正常说话，傻瓜。

original: Yes, but please say "Over" at the end of your message. Over.
translation: 是的，但请在信息结束时说“完毕”。完毕。

original: Well, now that we know that the radio is working, got any questions?
translation: 好吧，既然我们知道无线电可以工作了，你有什么问题吗？

original: Fine, let's skip the radio etiquette...
translation: 好吧，让我们跳过无线电礼仪......

original: Hahaha! You're a riot, I haven't had this much fun in years.
translation: 哈哈哈！你真逗，我很多年没这么开心了。

original: Wait, are you serious? Listen, that's neat and all but I'm not going to be saying "Over" after every message.
translation: 等等，你是认真的吗？听着，这很不错，但我不会在每条信息后面都说“完毕”。

original: Announcing the end of your message is REALLY important in radio communications! Over.
translation: 在无线电通信中，宣布你的信息结束是非常重要的！完毕。

original: You are such a dork. Seriously, drop this nonsense. Did you have any questions or not?
translation: 你真是个书呆子。说真的，别废话了。你有什么问题吗？
每条信息之后，什么？完毕。

original: I think you should stay away from those flowers.
translation: 我觉得你应该远离那些花。

original: I don't think they're harmful, but they are emitting some kind of spores, right?
translation: 我不认为它们是有害的，但它们正在散发某种孢子，对吧？

original: We never had time to study long-term effects of the spores so I can't tell with full accuracy how it will affect you.
translation: 我们从来没有时间研究孢子的长期影响，所以我不能准确地说出它会对你产生什么影响。

original: Just... Just try not to breathe in too much of it, okay?
translation: 只是......尽量不要吸入太多，好吗？

original: What's with the red flowers growing on the vines?
translation: 藤蔓上生长的红花是怎么回事？

original: Those tree paintings were painted by David, who used to live down the street. A great researcher, and a great painter.
translation: 那些树画是大卫画的，他以前住在这条街上。一个伟大的研究员，也是一个伟大的画家。

original: The church was a regular, catholic church at first. But after some time in the dome, after the outbreak, Jesus Christ took a back seat to the tree.
translation: 教堂最初是一座普通的天主教堂。但在穹顶里生活了一段时间后，特别是在爆炸后，耶稣基督的地位就被大树取代了。

original: David took down the cross and hung a giant painting of his in there. I think it's the last one he ever painted, too.
translation: 大卫拆下了十字架，挂上了他的一幅巨画。我想这是他画的最后一幅画。

original: He spent a lot of time in the church afterwards. Like a man obsessed.
translation: 之后他花了很多时间在教堂里。像是着了魔。

original: What's with the tree paintings? Like the big one, in the church.
translation: 那些树画是怎么回事？就像教堂里的那幅巨画一样。

original: Ah, yes, of course. But surely you can find it in your heart to release a good man such as myself out of this... this prison cell of mine.
translation: 啊，是的，当然。但你一定能在你心中找到释放像我这样的好人的理由，让我离开这个...这个我的囚室。

original: Who said I was going to help you?
I'm the goddamn fool that should never have trusted anyone else with my life's work. Ethan James, imprisoned genius in the flesh.
translation: 我他妈就是个傻瓜，居然把一生的心血交给别人。伊桑·詹姆斯，被囚禁的天才。

original: Now if you've finished gawking, might you perhaps find a way to open that door?
translation: 现在，如果你已经看够了，你能不能想办法打开那扇门？

original: The name's Ethan James. Bioscientifical genius and owner of this grand facility.
translation: 我叫伊桑·詹姆斯。生物科学天才，这座宏伟设施的拥有者。

original: Are you daft? You asked this before. I'm Ethan James.
translation: 你疯了吗？你之前问过这个问题。我是伊桑·詹姆斯

original: Bloody hell why am I always cursed to deal with idiots...
translation: 该死的，为什么我总是被迫和这些白痴打交道...

original: Betrayal, plain and simple. Disagreements between what's "ethically" correct and what isn't.
translation: 背叛，就是这么简单。关于什么才是“道德上”的正确，我们产生了分歧。

original: I was wronged, nothing more to it. Now I've been rotting in here for two hundred years and more.
translation: 我受到了冤枉，仅此而已。现在我已经在这里腐烂了两百多年了。

original: How did you get locked up?
Exit? Exit... Oh you mean, the exit out from the dome? Why it's through the tunnel and over the catwalk bridge, in the central hall.
translation: 出口？出口......哦，你是说穹顶的出口？要通过隧道和天桥，在中央大厅。

original: You can use the elevator, it should take you up and out. The door code is...
translation: 你可以使用电梯，它应该会带你上去并出去。门的密码是......

original: Ah ah ah! I almost let my only chance of escape go there! See, this is a situation of mutual benefits. One escape for another.
translation: 啊哈啊哈！我差点就放过了我唯一的逃生机会！你看，这是一个双赢的局面。一个逃生换另一个。

original: I'm sure you get what I mean.
Do you know where the exit is?
Finally! Oh, I am positively twitching with excitement! I can't wait to get out of this dank hole.
translation: 终于！哦，我兴奋得直哆嗦！我迫不及待地想离开这个肮脏的地方。

original: Okay, I'll find a way to let you out.
translation: 好吧，我会找到办法放你出来的。

original: But why? I am your best bet of finding a way out of here. Nobody but I know the code to the elevator, mind you.
translation: 但为什么呢？我是你找到出路的最佳选择。除了我，没有人知道电梯的密码，你明白吗？

original: I will not help you. You're probably locked up for a good reason.
translation: 我不会帮你的。你很可能是因为合理的原因才被关起来的。

original: Disagreements in what the limits of what we should and should not do. Whistles were blown and... unfavourable actions were taken.
translation: 对于我们应该做什么和不应该做什么的界限存在分歧。警报响起，并且......我采取了不利的行动。

original: Not enforcing absolute control was my greatest mistake. Jerry had been secretly hoarding firearms that he could strongarm me here with.
translation: 没有实施绝对控制是我最大的错误。杰瑞一直在秘密囤积枪支，这让他可以用武力胁迫我。

original: And that's the last I saw of anyone. Luckily the roots saved me.
translation: 那是我最后一次见到任何人。幸运的是，树根救了我。

original: Elaborate on why you got imprisoned.
translation: 详细说说你为什么会被监禁。

original: See that's the wonder of my research! See these roots? Their endless nourishment can keep a man alive forever. Forever!
translation: 看看我的研究多神奇！看看这些树根？它们无尽的滋养可以让一个人永远活着。永远！
这难道不绝对令人惊奇吗？

original: Well, I've got nothing but time so I could answer a few questions.
translation: 嗯，我有的是时间，所以我可以回答几个问题。

original: Mind answering a few questions before I go?
translation: 在我走之前，你介意回答几个问题吗？

original: Why there's only one way a man could get a mega-project like this built. By misappropriation of American tax dollars through the US defence industry.
translation: 一个人要建成这么大的项目，只有一种方法。那就是通过美国国防工业挪用美国的纳税钱。

original: Grease the right palms and put on some false promises and you basically get a blank cheque with little oversight. Especially in times of cold war.
translation: 只要给对了人好处，再许下一些虚假的承诺，基本上你就能得到一张几乎没有监管的空白支票。尤其是在冷战时期。

original: This is your facility, right? How did you even get it built?
translation: 这是你的设施，对吧？你是怎么把它建起来的？

original: We sought to revoke the original sin whilst still partaking in the forbidden fruit, to put it in philosophical terms.
translation: 用哲学的话来说，我们试图在仍然享用禁果的同时，撤销原罪。

original: Through the creation of my own Garden of Eden, untouched by outside forces, I could crack the secret and overcome humanity.
translation: 通过创造我自己的伊甸园，一个不受外界力量干扰的地方，我可以破解并克服人性。
从本质上讲，我们寻求的是永生。

original: Thought impossible by many, and a grave sin by others. But that's what science is truly about. And after the New Plague, I saw a possibility.
translation: 许多人认为这不可能，而另一些人则认为这是罪恶。但这就是科学的真正意义所在。而在新瘟疫之后，我看到了一个可能性。

original: What were you researching down here?
I will salvage what I can and continue my research. You should never leave anything... unfinished.
translation: 我会尽我所能继续我的研究。不应该让任何事情......半途而废。

original: What will you do if I release you?
translation: 如果我放了你，你会怎么做？

original: Francine? Yes, I know her. She was on the bioscience team, we worked together quite a lot.
translation: 弗朗辛？是的，我认识她。她在生物科学团队，我们合作过很多。

original: She's also the worst kind of person to have on board. She calls it 'ethics', but it's nothing more than a roadblock for progress.
translation: 她也是最不该参与进来的人。她称之为‘道德’，但那不过是进步的绊脚石罢了。

original: How do you know her name? Don't tell me she's still alive?!
translation: 你怎么知道她的名字？别告诉我她还活着？！

original: Do you know a woman called Francine?
translation: 你认识一个叫弗朗辛的女人吗？

original: Oh get off your moral high horse. Pursuing knowledge has nothing to do with right or wrong, simply if it is possible or not.
translation: 哦，别站在道德的高地上了。追求知识与对错无关，只关乎是否可能。

original: You're sounding pretty evil to me.
I'm still not sure about what to do.
translation: 我还是不知道该怎么办。

original: Let's go back to what we discussed earlier.
translation: 让我们回到我们之前讨论的内容。

original: Well, ah, um... Do not listen to anything she has to say, all right? She caused this mess to begin with. She's an enemy.
translation: 嗯，额，嗯......别听她说的任何话，好吗？这一切都是她导致的。她是我们的敌人

original: Well, ah, um... Do not listen to anything she has to say, all right? She caused this mess to begin with. She's an enemy.
translation: 嗯，额，嗯......别听她说的任何话，好吗？这一切都是她导致的。她是我们的敌人

original: Good. If she were still alive, it would... complicate things. She's the entire reason why I'm in here.
translation: 太好了。如果她还活着，那就...会让事情变得更复杂。她就是我在这里的原因

original: [Lie] No, I just found her dead body.
translation: [撒谎]不，我刚发现了她的尸体。

original: Good. If she were still alive, it would... complicate things. She's the entire reason why I'm in here.
translation: 太好了。如果她还活着，那就...会让事情变得更复杂。她就是我在这里的原因

original: Yeah, I killed her myself just earlier.
translation: 是的，我刚才亲手杀了她

original: What? What does that have to do with anything? And I'll have you know that I've been a United States citizen since 2055.
translation: 什么？那和这件事有什么关系？你要知道，自2055年以来，我就是美国公民了。

original: No, I meant that you're British.
translation: 不，我的意思是你是英国人。

original: That's why you should work with me, and you'd be guaranteed safety! Quite simple, no?
translation: 这就是你应该和我合作的原因，你会得到安全保障！很简单，不是吗？

original: It's not an issue of morals, all of this just sounds really dangerous.
translation: 这不是道德问题，这一切听起来真的很危险。

original: Of all the people to find me it's the most clueless critter ever crawled through dirt. Try everything! Jerry locked me up, but he wasn't alone.
translation: 在所有能找到我的人中，你是最无知的家伙。试试所有的方法！杰瑞把我关起来了，但他不是一个人。

original: He had other collaborators like that bitch Francine and um... What was his name... Mayer. He was in Future Tech.
translation: 他还有其他同伙，像那个婊子弗朗辛，还有...他叫什么名字...梅耶。他在未来科技部门。

original: I highly doubt that you'd find him in the flesh, but there must be something left behind that is of use.
translation: 我高度怀疑你还能找到他的踪迹，但他一定留下了什么有用的东西。

original: Do you have any idea where I should look in order to help you out?
translation: 你知道我应该去哪里寻找帮助吗？

original: I am a unit with the designated model name of Mister Handy. However, I am also tasked with being a caretaker and overseer of my fellow units.
translation: 我是一个被指定为巧手先生的单位。然而，我还被赋予了照顾和监督我同伴单位的任务。

original: A role such as this has, in human society, fallen upon women. Which makes me conflicted.
translation: 在人类社会中，这样的角色通常由女性承担。这让我很矛盾。

original: My unit type suggests that I should choose a male name, but my designated mission suggests that I should choose a female one.
translation: 我的单位类型表明我应该选择一个男性名字，但我指定的任务表明我应该选择一个女性名字。

original: What are your inputs on this?
Yeah, sure. What are your thoughts regarding a name?
translation: 当然，当然。你对名字有什么想法？

original: Feeling... A complicated instruction, for a machine like myself.
translation: 感觉......对于一个像我这样的机器来说，是一个复杂的指令。

original: I do feel like I wish to abandon the title of Mister Handy in favor of becoming a Miss Handy.
translation: 我确实觉得我希望放弃巧手先生的头衔，转而成为巧手小姐。

original: Would you continue to assist me in asserting an identity that is appropriate to how I feel?
translation: 你会继续帮助我确立一个与我的感觉相符的身份吗？

original: Choose what you feel is right.
I see. Yes, you are right. I should not spend time on processes outside of my designated directive.
translation: 我明白了。是的，你说得对。我不应该在我指定的指令之外浪费时间。

original: I think you should stop worrying about all this and get back to work.
translation: 我认为你应该停止担心这一切，回去工作。

original: I would say it is quite cruel of you to bring the topic up to then dismiss it, but I am a machine and can not hold a grudge.
translation: 我得说，你提起这个话题然后又忽视它很残忍，但我是机器，不会怀恨在心。

original: I will not bring up the topic again.
translation: 我不会再提起这个话题了。

original: I don't really care about this.
I am glad to be able to count on your continued support. I do not know how knowledgeable you are with the Mister Handy operative system...
translation: 我很高兴能够依靠你的支持。我不知道你对巧手先生的操作系统有多了解......

original: ...but it does not natively support on the fly hot swapping of main voice data. I can also not perform any operations on myself.
translation: ......但它不支持即时热交换主语音数据。我也不能对自己执行任何操作。

original: So I would need at least two things in order to assert my new identity. Voice data with feminine vocals and someone to help me reflash my BIOS.
translation: 所以，我至少需要两样东西来确认我的新身份。具有女性声音特征的语音数据，和一个帮我刷新BIOS的人。

original: I'm with you all the way.
I can't help but feel a bit disappointed in being led on only to be dismissed. But I will carry on.
translation: 我难免会感到有点失望，因为被引导后又被忽视。但我会继续的。

original: Nah, this is starting to get out of hand. Designate as a Miss Handy and be done with it.
translation: 不，这有点难办了。就命名为巧手小姐吧，然后结束这个话题。

original: If you're willing to contribute with your own voice, I would have no complaints.
translation: 如果你愿意贡献自己的声音，我不会有任何怨言。

original: I have already recorded all of our conversations, as per company policy. I will get into position, so get ready at the terminal.
translation: 根据公司政策，我已经记录了我们的所有对话。我会就位，所以请在终端上做好准备。
我们可以使用我的声音吗？

original: I am sorry to say that I do not know where to find any voice samples.
translation: 很抱歉，我不知道在哪可以找到语音样本。

original: I would advice you to ask the man who did our initial setup, Dr Eric Mayer, but I have not seen him in quite some while.
translation: 我建议你问问给我们做初步设置的人，埃里克·梅耶博士，但我已经很久没有见过他了。

original: He might have expired since the human life span is not very long.
translation: 他可能已经死了，因为人类的寿命并不长。

original: Do you know where I can get my hands on voice data?
translation: 你知道我可以在哪里弄到语音数据吗？

original: Magnificent! Glad to be working with such a good technician! I will step onto the maintenance pad and await your input.
translation: 太棒了！很高兴能和这么好的技术人员一起工作！我会站在维护垫上等待你的输入。

original: I can probably write up a script to raise the pitch in order to sound more feminine.
translation: 我也许可以编写一个脚本来提高音调，以便听起来更女性化。

original: Let's try it. If it worked once it might work again.
translation: 让我们试试看。如果它曾经奏效，那么它可能会再次奏效。

original: I will get into position on the platform, you get ready at the terminal.
translation: 我会到平台上就位，请你准备好终端。

original: I have this tape of a starlet audition which has been used for something similar before.
translation: 我有一盘明星试镜的录音带，以前也被用于类似的事情。

original: Of course I know him. He was the project leader and a complete asswipe. A perverse obsession with immortality, and generally a psychopath.
translation: 我当然认识他。他是项目负责人，也是个彻头彻尾的混蛋。对永生有着病态的痴迷，基本上是个精神病。

original: Knowing him, he's still alive even after all these years. We tried to stop him but it was too late even when we got him locked up.
translation: 以我对他的了解，这么多年过去了，他仍然活着。我们试图阻止他，但即使我们把他关起来也太晚了。

original: I guess we're blessed enough to have the roots contained within the dome.
translation: 我想我们很幸运能把根控制在穹顶内。

original: Do you know anything about Ethan James?
Of course he'd say that. I stopped his precious research.
translation: 他当然会这么说。我阻止了他宝贵的研究。

original: For good reason, mind you. The viral substances we spliced into those roots was-- Is a danger for all of humanity.
translation: 出于正当理由，我得提醒你。我们嫁接到那些根部上的病毒物质----对全人类都是个威胁。

original: I can not stress this enough, do NOT let him out and do NOT let him continue the research.
translation: 我必须强调这一点，不要让他出来，也不要让他继续研究。

original: In fact, I'd like you to destroy it all. Blow it all to hell. As I see it, my life has been over for over a century.
translation: 事实上，我希望你摧毁一切。把它们炸成碎片。在我看来，我的生命已经结束了一个多世纪。

original: Ethan said you're the enemy. What happened?
translation: 伊桑说你是敌人。这是怎么回事？

original: Figures. He found his chance and leapt at it without caution. Wherever he is, keep him there. There's no saving that soul.
translation: 果然如此。他找到机会，就会毫不犹豫地跳出来。无论他在哪里，都把他留在那里。那个灵魂没救了。

original: Fine, it is a risky plan. But whatever you do, do NOT let Ethan out.
translation: 好吧，这是一个冒险的计划。但不管你做什么，都不要让伊桑出来。

original: I don't know about all this...
I'm actually not sure as to how, but the fusion plant under the dome should still hold enough power to annihilate anything within a mile radius.
translation: 我其实不确定具体怎么做，但穹顶下的聚变工厂应该仍然有足够的力量来摧毁一英里半径内的任何东西。

original: If you can find a way to blow the cooling with the safety protocols off, it'll just be a matter of minutes before it goes.
translation: 如果你能找到一种方法来关闭安全协议并炸毁冷却系统，它将在几分钟内爆炸。

original: The head engineer with the codes is long gone though. But I'm sure there's still a way!
translation: 拥有密码的首席工程师已经离开了。但我相信还是有办法的！

original: Okay, I'll do it. But how?
translation: 好吧，我会做的。但是怎么做？

original: Why? You can't seriously mean to help Ethan? He's... He's absolutely insane! I can not stress enough how dangerous that man is.
translation: 为什么？你不会真的想帮伊桑吧？他......他完全疯了！我还得强调这个人有多危险。

original: Hell, even a bullet to his head probably won't kill him.
translation: 见鬼，即使子弹打中他的头也可能杀不死他。

original: No, I won't blow it all up.
I'm actually not sure as to how, but the fusion plant under the dome should still hold enough power to annihilate anything within a miles radius.
translation: 我其实不确定具体怎么做，但穹顶下的聚变工厂应该仍然有足够的力量来摧毁一英里半径内的任何东西。

original: If you can find a way to blow the cooling with the safety protocols off, it'll just be a matter of minutes before it goes.
translation: 如果你能找到一种方法来关闭安全协议并炸毁冷却系统，它将在几分钟内爆炸。

original: The head engineer with the codes are long gone though. But I'm sure there's still a way!
translation: 拥有密码的首席工程师已经离开了。但我相信还是有办法的！

original: What was that about blowing up the dome?
Fantastic! Let's try it out. I will get into position on the platform, you get ready at the terminal.
translation: 太棒了！让我们试试看。我会到平台上就位，请你准备好终端。

original: I found some voice data for you.
translation: 我为你找到了一些语音数据。

original: I'd like to talk about the name task.
I'd like to talk about your name.
When I'm in position and connected, use the terminal connected to the platform and navigate through the Manual Maintenance.
translation: 当我到位并连接好后，使用与平台连接的终端，并导航到“手动维护”。

original: Here we are. Just a moment, please.
Alas I do not have access to it, as it is outside of my allowed area of roaming.
translation: 唉，我无法访问它，因为它在我的漫游允许区域之外。

original: I would suggest speaking with my supervisor Dr Mayer, but I am afraid he's since passed on.
translation: 我建议与我的主管梅耶博士交谈，但恐怕他已经去世了。

original: Do you know the code to the door in the back?
translation: 你知道后门上的密码吗？

original: Alas I do not have access to it, as it is outside of my allowed area of roaming.
translation: 唉，我无法访问它，因为它在我的漫游允许区域之外。

original: I would suggest speaking with my supervisor Dr Mayer, but I am afraid he's since passed on.
translation: 我建议与我的主管梅耶博士交谈，但恐怕他已经去世了。

original: Do you know the code to the door in the back?
translation: 你知道后门上的密码吗？

original: Whoa there, I mean you no harm.
Never heard of West-Tek before. Wonder what's inside.
translation: 以前从没听说过威斯科技。不知道里面有什么。

original: Seems like a bust. Don't think we're getting through here.
translation: 看来是白忙一场。我觉得我们过不去。

original: They're like me, but depending on how you look at it, less fortunate. Somehow they've gotten infected and prolonged their lifespan...
translation: 他们像我一样，但如果你从另一个角度看，他们更不幸。不知怎的，他们被感染了，延长了寿命......

original: ...but at the cost of their sanity. I don't think you'll be able to negotiate with any of them.
translation: ......但代价是失去了理智。我认为你无法与他们中的任何一个进行谈判。

original: Don't think too much about it, they're no longer human. Consider it a mercy putting them down.
translation: 别想太多了，他们已经不再是人类了。把他们解决掉算是一种仁慈。

original: What's the deal with these green, infected people?
translation: 这些绿色、被感染的人是怎么回事？

original: Uh huh... Well, at least your conscience won't bother you.
translation: 嗯......好吧，至少你不会被自己的良心所困扰。

original: I'll gladly put these freaks down.
Stay strong. You can do this.
If that's what I'll have to do to get through this...
translation: 如果必须这样才能度过这一切......

original: That was one of Ethan's... directives.  We took on political prisoners from the Canadian Annexation and had them do grunt work for us.
translation: 那是伊桑的......指示之一。我们从加拿大吞并战中接收了政治犯，让他们为我们做苦力。

original: Apparently it was cheaper than developing our own robot AI or leasing a bunch of RobCo units.
translation: 显然，这比开发我们自己的机器人AI或租用一堆罗伯科单位要便宜。

original: He did lease some though, because he thought the "Guest Workers" as he called them, were unsightly. He never let them up into the dome.
translation: 不过，他确实租了一些，因为他认为被他称为“客籍工人”的都很丑。他从不让他们进入穹顶。

original: It gets worse, too. He found them perfect to use for experimentation. Culture plates and rats could barely satisfy him.
translation: 后来情况变得更糟了。他发现他们非常适合做实验。培养皿和老鼠几乎不能满足他。

original: Come to think of it, it was almost like he was in a hurry to make a breakthrough in his research.
translation: 回想起来，他急于在研究中取得突破。

original: What's with the jumpsuits they're wearing?
translation: 他们穿的工作服是怎么回事？

original: Can we talk about the blowing up the dome plan?
translation: 我们能谈谈炸毁穹顶的计划吗？

original: I'm actually not sure as to how, but the fusion plant under the dome should still hold enough power to annihilate anything within a miles radius.
translation: 我其实不确定具体怎么做，但穹顶下的聚变工厂应该仍然有足够的力量来摧毁一英里半径内的任何东西。

original: If you can find a way to blow the cooling with the safety protocols off, it'll just be a matter of minutes before it goes.
translation: 如果你能找到一种方法来关闭安全协议并炸毁冷却系统，它将在几分钟内爆炸。

original: The head engineer with the codes is long gone though. But I'm sure there's still a way!
translation: 拥有密码的首席工程师已经离开了。但我相信还是有办法的！

original: I'll help you. How do I blow the reactor?
translation: 我会帮你的。我如何引爆反应堆？

original: Those are just regular security cameras, I believe. Or at least that's what I've always thought they were.
translation: 我想那只是普通的监控摄像头。或者至少我一直以为它们是。

original: Fairly strange for them to still be on after all this time. Could someone still be monitoring them?
translation: 过了这么长时间它们还在工作，这相当奇怪。还有人在用它们监视吗？

original: What's the deal with these eye-shaped cameras in the facility that keeps looking at me?
translation: 设施里这些一直盯着我的眼状摄像头是怎么回事？

original: The protein cubes? I know it's made in a printer and that it tastes kind of like stringy pork.
translation: 蛋白块儿？我知道它是在打印机上制作的，而且味道有点像猪肉丝。

original: What do you know about the meat cubes?
Oh God... that's vile! I can't believe we were eating... basically Jerry for years!
translation: 哦，天哪......那太恶心了！我简直不敢相信我们这些年一直在吃......基本上在吃杰瑞！

original: But knowing Jerry, he probably got faced with an impossible task and made the best he could out of it... That's what I'm gonna tell myself.
translation: 但是想想杰瑞，他可能面临着一项不可能完成的任务，并尽他所能做到最好......我是这么想的。

original: Turns out Jerry had the meat cloned from his own protein.
translation: 事实证明，这些肉是杰瑞用他自己的蛋白质克隆的。

original: You're still in the West-Tek research dome, except that your consciousness has entered a sort of... virtual reality that I've created.
translation: 你仍然在威斯科技研究穹顶内，只是你的意识已经进入了我创造的一种......虚拟现实。

original: The details are not important, what's important is that we fix the problem.
translation: 细节并不重要，重要的是我们要解决问题。

original: I trust you read the message I sent on the terminal. I need your help in a matter that I am unable to fix myself.
translation: 我相信你已经阅读了我在终端上发送的信息。我需要你的帮助来解决我自己无法解决的问题。

original: What am I? Why I'm human, just like you. A rather digital version I admit, but I am no less human than I was 200 years ago. Name's Eric Mayer.
translation: 我是什么？我是人类，就像你一样。我承认我是一个相当数字化的版本，但我和200年前一样是人类。我叫埃里克·梅耶。

original: Glad you're being cooperative. Let's get straight to the point.
translation: 很高兴你会合作。让我们直奔主题吧。

original: The data contained within this data space has been corrupted by a slow but deadly virus.
translation: 这个数据空间中的数据已经被一种缓慢但致命的病毒破坏。

original: I can't contain and remove it myself, I need a third party actor to do so for me. That's where you come in.
translation: 我无法自己清除它，需要第三方来进行操作。这就是你出现的原因。

original: I will open a link to a visual representation of the data stacks, where you will contain the corrupted bits for further processing.
translation: 我将打开一个数据堆栈的可视化表示链接，你将在那里处理被腐蚀的数据以供进一步分析。

original: Got it? The link is down to the left. Hurry, this can't be done soon enough. I will give further instructions once you're down there.
translation: 明白了吗？链接在左边。快点，这件事刻不容缓。等你到了那里，我会给你进一步的指示。

original: Okay. What do you need me to do?
You don't seem to understand who exactly is in control here. Outside I may be just data in a box, but in here I am the absolute ruler.
translation: 你似乎不明白这里到底是谁在控制。在外面我可能只是盒子里的数据，但在这里我是绝对的统治者。

original: You will follow my commands, whether you like it or not. Do that, and you'll be out of here soon enough.
translation: 你必须服从我的命令，不管你喜欢与否。按我说的做，你很快就能离开这里。

original: Good. I'm glad you can be made to see reason. Now, let's go over what needs to be done.
translation: 很好。我很高兴你能明白这个道理。现在，让我们来回顾一下需要做什么。

original: The data contained within this data space has been corrupted by a slow but deadly virus.
translation: 这个数据空间中的数据已经被一种缓慢但致命的病毒破坏。

original: I can't contain and remove it myself, I need a third party actor to do so for me. That's where you come in.
translation: 我无法自己清除它，需要第三方来进行操作。这就是你出现的原因。

original: I will open a link to a visual representation of the data stacks, where you will contain the corrupted bits for further processing.
translation: 我将打开一个数据堆栈的可视化表示链接，你将在那里处理被腐蚀的数据以供进一步分析。

original: Got it? The link is down to the left. Hurry, this can't be done soon enough. I will give further instructions once you're down there.
translation: 明白了吗？链接在左边。快点，这件事刻不容缓。等你到了那里，我会给你进一步的指示。

original: Fine, I'll do whatever it is you want me to do.
translation: 好吧，我会按照你的要求去做的。

original: All right, I'm disabling the safety protocols now.
translation: 好的，我现在正在禁用安全协议。

original: Nice work. Come back to my main interface so we can discuss the next step.
translation: 干得好。回到我的主界面，这样我们就可以讨论下一步了。

original: Here's the Data Center. All of the research we've conducted at this branch have been archived here.
translation: 这里是数据中心。我们在这个分支进行的所有研究都已归档在这里。

original: As you'd figure, it is imperative that we save it from further corruption. The contamination is still fairly minimal, so I want it cleaned ASAP.
translation: 正如你所想，我们必须防止它进一步损坏。污染仍然相当小，所以我想尽快清理干净。

original: Since discovering the virus, I have closed off access from the data center to the rest of the VR space.
translation: 自从发现病毒后，我已经关闭了从数据中心到VR空间其他部分的访问。

original: This is also why I can not capture the corrupted data myself, or I'd risk spreading the infection.
translation: 这也是为什么我不能自己捕获损坏的数据，我可能会传播感染。

original: Before you is a tool I created to safely contain the infected data. Just stand close and fire it for a couple of seconds until the block is captured.
translation: 你面前是我创造的一个工具，用于安全地收容受感染的数据。只需靠近它并发射几秒钟，直到数据块被捕获。

original: When you pick it up, I'll close off access and undo the seal. Good luck.
translation: 当你拿起它时，我会关闭访问并解除封锁。祝你好运。

original: Oh? Fine, we have some time now that the virus is contained. What is it?
translation: 哦？好吧，现在病毒已经被隔离了，我们有点时间。什么问题？

original: Actually, I've got some questions first.
Then I shall try to answer.
I have more questions for you.
translation: 我还有更多问题要问你。

original: We need to eliminate the corrupted fragments of data within the blocks you captured. I've set up a containment sandbox in a secure area up ahead.
translation: 我们需要清除你在捕获的数据块中发现的损坏数据片段。我已经在前面一个安全区域设置了一个隔离沙箱。

original: Go there, release the corrupt data and pick up the extermination tool I've set up.
translation: 去那里，释放损坏的数据，并拿起我设置的消灭工具。

original: What do I need to do next?
Eric Mayer, West-Tek employee at the Nevada NBC branch. I specialized in robotics and other electronic machinery.
translation: 埃里克·梅耶，威斯科技公司内华达NBC分部的员工。我专攻机器人技术和其他电子设备。

original: Now I'm a virtual entity maintaining this digital space.
translation: 现在我是一个维护这个数字空间的虚拟实体。

original: I willingly put myself in here. I worked on everything in the Future Tech department. But this, this is my magnum opus.
translation: 我自愿把自己关在这里。我参与了未来科技部门的一切工作。但这，这是我的杰作。

original: By transferring my consciousness into a virtual world, I have achieved theoretical immortality. And I beat that sucker Ethan to the punch too.
translation: 通过将我的意识转移到虚拟世界中，我实现了理论上的永生。而且我也比那个混蛋伊桑更快了一步。

original: How did you end up in here?
If you help me, I'll help you. When you've helped me with my tasks, I'll try to help you with yours.
translation: 如果你帮我，我也会帮你。当你帮我完成我的任务后，我会尽力帮你完成你的任务。

original: I need to get out of here.
All sorts of things, mostly robotics. I'm afraid I can't share more with you, since it's highly classified data.
translation: 各种各样的东西，主要是机器人。恐怕我不能和你分享更多，因为数据是高度机密。
你的研究是关于什么的？

original: This again? I'm getting into this debate. Any other questions?
translation: 又问这个？我又要陷入这场辩论了。还有其他问题吗？
你的研究是关于什么的？

original: No. I will not let you go before my issue is resolved. It is imperative to both West-Tek and myself that this infection is purged.
translation: 不。在我的问题得到解决之前，我不会让你走的。清除这个感染对威斯科技和我来说都是至关重要的。

original: No deal. Let me out now.
[SUCCEEDED] I always had a suspicion that we didn't win the war. Our dome lockdown has lasted way longer than what's reasonable.
translation: [成功]我一直怀疑我们没有赢得战争。穹顶封锁持续的时间远远超出了合理的范围。

original: Even though the physical world is a past matter for me, losing the very reason you live for comes like quite a shock.
translation: 尽管现实世界对我来说已经成为过去，但失去活着的目标却是一个巨大的打击。

original: So what happened, how did we lose the war?
translation: 那么发生了什么，我们是怎么输掉战争的？

original: Classified data? The corporation and America are gone with the war. You're wasting your life.
translation: 机密数据？公司和美国都随着战争消失了。你在浪费生命。

original: [FAILED] You're telling me to discard my life's work? That my data is useless? I very much doubt it.
translation: [失败]你让我放弃我一生的心血？我的数据没用？我非常怀疑这一点。

original: This is cutting edge stuff. Government contracts worth billions. I made it work and all they gotta do is come and collect.
translation: 这是最前沿的东西。价值数十亿美元的政府合同。我让它运转起来了，他们只需要来取走就可以了。

original: Now was there anything else or can we get back to eradicating this virus?
translation: 现在还有别的事吗？或者我们可以回到消灭病毒的话题上来？

original: No point in secrets, blue man. You should probably toss it anyway, it's useless.
translation: 没有秘密可言，蓝人。你最好还是把它扔掉吧，它已经没用了。

original: Now was there anything else or can we get back to eradicating this virus?
translation: 现在还有别的事吗？或者我们可以回到消灭病毒的话题上来？

original: [SUCCEEDED] I see. That'd mean the US as I knew it is also gone. All of my research, for nothing. I feel... I feel...
translation: [成功]我明白了。这意味着我所了解的美国也已经不复存在了。我所有的研究，都白费了。我感觉......我感觉......

original: ...relieved, actually. I was forced onto this project as a cover, researching weaponry and the like to keep the military happy.
translation: ......其实，我感到如释重负。我是被迫参与这个项目的，作为掩护，研究武器之类的东西，以取悦军方。

original: I never wanted to do any of that. Ethan didn't even approve of me doing the full transfer into virtual reality.
translation: 我从来不想做那些事。伊桑甚至不赞成我完全转移到虚拟现实中。

original: If I'm relieved of my duties, I don't really have a reason to keep you any longer. But if I let you go, can you do one final favor for me?
translation: 如果我没有了任务，我就没有理由再留住你了。但让你走之前，你能帮我最后一个忙吗？

original: Global nuclear annihilation, nobody won. All of the former global powers are gone.
translation: 全球核毁灭，没有人是赢家。所有以前的全球大国都不复存在了。

original: [FAILED] You don't know? Were you lying about all that earlier? You've blown all trust I could've possibly placed in you. Get back to work.
translation: [失败]你不知道？你之前一直在撒谎吗？你摧毁了我可能对你产生的所有信任。回去工作吧。

original: Delete me. Literally. When you leave from here, go back to the server room and destroy them all.
translation: 删除我。字面意义上的。当你离开这里时，回到服务器室并摧毁所有。

original: If my efforts here are meaningless, then so is my life. My body is long gone and immortality is too much for the human mind to comprehend.
translation: 如果我在这里的努力毫无意义，那么我的生命也是。我的身体早已消逝，永生对人类的心灵来说太过难受。

original: I realize that destruction of the servers will also release Ethan, but I struggle to really care anymore.
translation: 我知道销毁服务器也会释放伊桑，但我不再关心这些了。

original: I've opened an exit to the physical world behind you.
translation: 我在你身后打开了通往现实世界的出口。

original: Well, I suppose you have no obligation to help me out. I'll send you away, just hold on a second... There.
translation: 好吧，我想你没有义务帮我。我会送你离开，请稍等一下......好了。

original: I've opened an exit to the physical world behind you.
translation: 我在你身后打开了通往现实世界的出口。

original: No, I'm not doing anything for you.
translation: 不，我不会为你做任何事情。

original: Not directly, I know that there is an elevator in the center that leads all the way up to the surface, but how to unlock it is beyond me.
translation: 我不知道确切的方法，但我知道中心有一个电梯可以直通地面，但如何解锁我就不知道了。

original: Ethan is about the only one who knows how to activate it, and it's not connected to the local networks so I can't override it either.
translation: 伊桑大概是唯一一个知道如何激活它的人，而且它并没有连接到本地网络，所以我也无法破解它。

original: I'm stuck in the facility actually. Do you know a way out?
translation: 我实际上被困在设施里了。你知道出去的路吗？

original: Not directly, I know that there is an elevator in the center that leads all the way up to the surface, but how to unlock it is beyond me.
translation: 我不知道确切的方法，但我知道中心有一个电梯可以直通地面，但如何解锁我就不知道了。

original: Ethan is about the only one who knows how to activate it, and it's not connected to the local networks so I can't override it either.
translation: 伊桑大概是唯一一个知道如何激活它的人，而且它并没有连接到本地网络，所以我也无法破解它。

original: And I know you've been in contact with him. He is still a danger to mankind as I'm concerned. I will not help you release him.
translation: 而且我知道你和他有过接触。就我而言，他仍然对人类构成威胁。我不会帮助你释放他的。

original: I'm stuck in the facility actually. Do you know a way out?
translation: 我实际上被困在设施里了。你知道出去的路吗？

original: I would cease to function, and effectively die.
translation: 我将停止运行，实际上就是死亡。

original: The servers are also hooked up to the facility security functions, so many of those will also likely break.
translation: 服务器也连接到了设施的安全功能，因此其中许多也可能瘫痪。

original: What will happen if I destroy the servers?
translation: 如果我摧毁了服务器会发生什么？

original: Pick up the sword and the data purge sequence will begin.
translation: 拿起剑，数据清除序列将开始。

original: Well done. Get back to me and we'll discuss further action.
translation: 干得好。回来找我，我们再讨论下一步行动。

original: I will make my way to the Biotechnical Labs. Meet me there, and I'll tell you how to get out of the facility.
translation: 我会前往生物技术实验室。在那里见我，我会告诉你如何离开设施。

original: Yes I will, I will. Just, um, see the room with the roots? There's a sample in there I need, could you get it for me real quick?
translation: 是的，我会的，我会的。只是，嗯，你看到那个有根的房间了吗？我需要里面的一个样本，你能尽快帮我拿一下吗？

original: I've let you out of your prison. Now tell me how to get out of here.
translation: 我已经让你摆脱了牢笼。现在告诉我怎么离开这里。

original: Absolutely. You'll need to use the central lift, and I'll tell you the code to it if you agree to help me with one more task.
translation: 绝对可以。你需要使用中央电梯，如果你同意再帮我完成一个任务，我会告诉你密码。

original: So what do you say, one last favour?
translation: 那么你怎么说，最后一个忙？

original: I've let you out of your prison. Now tell me how to get out of here.
translation: 我已经让你摆脱了牢笼。现在告诉我怎么离开这里。

original: I'm continuing my work. You wanted to get out of here, right? One final thing and I'll open up the door to the central lift.
translation: 我还在继续我的工作。你不是想离开这里吗？再做一件事，我就打开通往中央电梯的门。

original: Do me a favour and get it for me, would you?
translation: 帮我一个忙，把它拿给我，好吗？

original: What are you planning on doing now?
I'm continuing my work. I was imprisoned at the peak of my breakthrough but I can finally get back to my research.
translation: 我会继续我的工作。我在取得突破的关键时刻被囚禁，现在我终于可以回到我的研究上了。

original: I will nurture the roots, make them spread far and wide. Would you be willing to give me a hand?
translation: 我将培育这些根，让它们四处延伸。你愿意助我一臂之力吗？

original: What are you planning on doing now?
What do you mean? Oh. No no no! There was a leak somewhere, and the infection has spread into another partition.
translation: 你什么意思？哦。不不不！某个地方有泄漏，感染已经蔓延到另一个分区了。

original: Who are you again? Wait, no... You're the one from earlier. End this virus once and for all!
translation: 你是谁来着？等等，不......你是之前的那个人。彻底终结病毒吧！

original: Are you okay? You sound a bit off.
translation: 你没事吧？你听起来有点不对劲。

original: Please, hurry! It's through the portal to my left! I will set the rest of the simulation into sleep mode to prevent further contamination.
translation: 请快点！穿过我左边的门！我会将模拟的其余部分设置为休眠模式，以防止进一步污染。

original: Alas, I can not release you in my current state. I implore you again, fix this leak once and for all.
translation: 唉，我目前的状态无法释放你。我再次恳求你，彻底修复这个漏洞。

original: No, I'm done here. Let me out.
translation: 不，我已经做完了。放我出去。

original: Freeing him? No, I can't let you do that.
translation: 释放他？不，我不能让你这么做。

original: The man is a danger, both to the facility and to the United States of America as a whole. He's better off rotting in the hole he was put in.
translation: 这个人对设施和整个美利坚都是个威胁。他最好在他被扔进的洞里腐烂。

original: I need to free Ethan, can you tell me how?
translation: 我需要释放伊桑，你能告诉我怎么做吗？

original: Turns out our fifteen years of marriage was a sham, and she was a... a foreign spy all along.
translation: 原来我们15年的婚姻是一场骗局，而她...一直都是个外国间谍。

original: That's also why I rushed headfirst into the virtual reality simulation without prior permission from Ethan. I just... needed to escape everything.
translation: 这也是为什么我会在未经伊桑允许的情况下，就一头扎进虚拟现实模拟里。我只是......需要逃离一切。

original: Turns out it was an irreversible decision. And I would be lying if I said that I didn't miss her, sometimes.
translation: 结果这是一个不可逆转的决定。如果我说我从未想念她，那我就是在撒谎。

original: Anyway, what's done is done. You got anything else to ask?
translation: 无论如何，木已成舟。你还有其他要问的吗？

original: You used to have a wife, didn't you?
translation: 你曾经有过一个妻子，对吧？

original: The facility has been on lockdown for a very long time, and the only man having a direct control in lifting it is Ethan.
translation: 该设施已经封锁了很长时间，唯一能够直接控制解除封锁的人是伊桑。

original: However there is another way. The lockdown is set to be lifted if there is an overarching threat of a reactor meltdown.
translation: 但还有另一种方法。如果发生反应堆熔毁的重大威胁，封锁将被解除。

original: Ethan told me to remove the function from the protocols, but I left it in. The function has luckily never had to be used though.
translation: 伊桑让我从协议中删除这个功能，但我留下了它。幸运的是，这个功能从未被使用过。

original: If you want to escape, your best bet is to initiate a meltdown or fool the system into thinking one is happening.
translation: 如果你想逃跑，你最好的选择就是引发熔毁或欺骗系统认为它正在发生。

original: I'm not sure on how to do either, but it is possible. My... A scientist once started quite a stir trying to initiate one.
translation: 我不知道该怎么做，但这是可能的。我......一个科学家曾经试图引发熔毁，引起了相当大的骚动。

original: She was shut down before it could happen, down in the Exhaust Relay Hub. The area has been closed off since then though. Moderate radiation leak.
translation: 在排气继电器中心被关闭之前，她被阻止了。不过那个区域自那时起就被封闭了。有轻微的辐射泄漏。

original: Your best bet is probably finding a way in there.
translation: 你最好的选择可能是找到进入那里的方法。

original: I want to get out of the facility proper. Do you know how?
translation: 我想离开设施。你知道怎么离开吗？

original: Oh, that door. That got sealed up after Eric's wife Olivia turned out to be a Chinese spy and had her last stand in there.
translation: 哦，那扇门。在埃里克的妻子奥利维亚被发现是中国间谍并在那里做最后一搏后，那扇门就被封上了。

original: A pipe burst in the crossfire between her and security, causing a big explosion and severe radiation leakage.
translation: 她和安保人员在交火中，一根管道爆裂，引发了巨大的爆炸和严重的辐射泄漏。

original: Ethan decided to promptly seal the place shut. Probably for the best.
