translation: 伊桑决定立即封锁这个地方。也许这是最好的选择。

original: What's the deal with the locked door by the far end of the Coolant Flow Tunnels?
translation: 冷却流动隧道远端的那扇锁着的门是怎么回事？

original: Well I don't think the pipes are fully sealed off everywhere. Maybe you can find an entrance somewhere.
translation: 嗯，我想管道并不是到处都完全密封的。也许你能在某个地方找到入口。

original: The only other way I could think of is to have Ethan open it, but I doubt that's an option.
translation: 我能想到的唯一另一种方法就是让伊桑打开它，但我怀疑这不是一个选项。

original: So is there no way in now?
translation: 那么现在就没有办法进去了吗？

original: So Eric was alive all this time, but inside the pod? Incredible... So what did you do? Did you find anything out?
translation: 所以埃里克一直还活着，但在舱室里？难以置信......那你做了什么？你发现什么了吗？

original: I was inside the VR pod, and Eric was in there too.
translation: 我在虚拟现实舱里，埃里克也在那里。

original: How did you get in here? Turn away at once.
translation: 你是怎么进来的？马上离开。

original: Did you not hear me? Get back to the mission.
translation: 你没听见吗？回到任务中去。

original: I'm sure you read the portal title. This area is private! Not for you! Shoo!
translation: 我确定你看到了门口的标志，这是私人区域！不是给你准备的！快走！

original: Please just give it up, okay? There's nothing to see back here.
translation: 请放弃吧，好吗？后面没什么可看的。

original: Okay, since you seem to be unable to find the exit I've done you a favor and placed it in a clearer spot. Leave. Now.
translation: 好吧，既然你似乎找不到出口，那我就帮帮你，把它放在了一个更显眼的位置。离开。现在。

original: Great, well let's get to it then. I believe my own goals align with yours. You want to get out of here, after all.
translation: 太好了，那么让我们开始吧。我相信我的目标与你的一致。毕竟你也想离开这里。

original: So you go and take the central elevator up top, and I'll be down here activating a chemical reaction to force a supergrowth.
translation: 所以你去坐中央电梯上去，而我会在这里激活一个化学反应来让植物超速生长。

original: The door code is written down on this note. Take the elevator up, then instantly take a left for another elevator.
translation: 门上的密码就写在这张纸条上。坐电梯上去，然后立刻左转进入另一部电梯。

original: Once up by the warehouse entrance, use this passcode at the switch in the controller room. When it's opened, your work is done and you may leave.
translation: 一旦到达仓库入口，请在控制器室的开关处使用此密码。当它打开时，你的工作就完成了，你可以离开了。

original: Really? This is where you draw the line? You got me out of my shackles just to end it here? Bahaha! Well, good luck on your own out there.
translation: 真的吗？这就是你的底线？你让我挣脱束缚只是为了在这里结束？哈哈哈！好吧，祝你在外面好运。

original: No, I will not help you.
Yes, I am the one who set the robotic maintenance system up. I even improved upon the software running it. What of it?
translation: 是的，是我设置了机器人维护系统。我甚至改进了运行它的软件。那又怎样？

original: Were you the one who set up the robots in the dome?
translation: 是你在穹顶里设置了机器人吗？

original: [SUCCEEDED] There is an override phrase, yes. "Robert House is a hack." I could go on about how much I hate that man but I'll spare you.
translation: [成功]是的，有一个覆盖短语。“罗伯特·豪斯是个黑客。”我可以继续说我多么讨厌那个人，但我会放过你。

original: You wouldn't happen to have programmed an override or something similar?
translation: 你不会编写了一个覆盖程序或类似的东西吧？

original: [FAILED] They are, yeah. More than you could ever imagine.
translation: [失败]他们是，是的。比你想象的要复杂得多。

original: I was just curious, you know. Robots are cool and all.
translation: 我只是好奇，你知道的。机器人很酷。

original: Do NOT compare me to that schmuck. All he ever did was steal the credit from his workers. I will never forgive him for what he did to me.
translation: 不要把我和那个混蛋相提并论。他所做的就是窃取他员工的功劳。我永远不会原谅他对我所做的事。

original: Sorry, sorry. I got a bit heated. Where were we?
translation: 抱歉，抱歉。我有点激动了。我们说到哪儿了？

original: Funny that you ended up sharing similar fates, living indefinitely in stasis.
translation: 有趣的是，你们最终拥有了相同的命运，无限期地生活在停滞状态中。

original: The facility has been in a lockdown state since 2074, and an elevated alert phase since 2083.
translation: 该设施自2074年以来一直处于封锁状态，自2083年以来一直处于高度警戒状态。

original: From what the network is telling me, there have been a number of incidents in the facility and there is no response from the security team.
translation: 根据网络告诉我的情况，设施内发生了多起事件，安全团队没有做出任何回应。

original: It is unclear when work will resume. Mr. James has the highest authority on such matters, but there has been no signs of his presence.
translation: 不清楚何时会恢复工作。詹姆斯先生在此类事务上有最高权力，但没有任何他出现的迹象。

original: This is primarily a research facility. The value lies in the data it produces. There isn't any vault with riches waiting to be plundered.
translation: 这主要是一个研究机构。其价值在于它产生的数据。这里没有装满财富的保险库等着被掠夺。

original: So, do you have any riches stored anywhere in this place?
translation: 那么，你在这个地方有储存什么财富吗？

original: This is primarily a research facility. The value lies in the data it produces. There isn't any vault with riches waiting to be plundered.
translation: 这主要是一个研究机构。其价值在于它产生的数据。这里没有装满财富的保险库等着被掠夺。

original: So, do you have any riches stored anywhere in this place?
translation: 那么，你在这个地方有储存什么财富吗？

original: [SUCCEEDED] Your grandma would have her vault deep in the facility, in a room beneath the coolant pipes and locked behind two locks.
translation: [成功]你奶奶的保险库在设施的深处，在冷却管道下方的一个房间里，被两把锁锁着。

original: She locked one with a regular key and the other with a keycode corresponding to the month and year of her birthday.
translation: 她用一把普通的钥匙锁了一把，另一把锁用了一个与她生日的月份和年份相对应的密码锁锁着。

original: My grandma had a facility just like this. I inherited it but I need to know where the vault is.
translation: 我奶奶也有一个这样的设施。我继承了它，但我想知道保险库在哪里。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Your grandma would have her vault deep in the facility, in a room beneath the coolant pipes and locked behind two locks.
translation: [成功]你奶奶的保险库在设施的深处，在冷却管道下方的一个房间里，被两把锁锁着。

original: She locked one with a regular key and the other with a keycode corresponding to the month and year of her birthday.
translation: 她用一把普通的钥匙锁了一把，另一把锁用了一个与她生日的月份和年份相对应的密码锁锁着。

original: My grandma had a facility just like this. I inherited it but I need to know where the vault is.
translation: 我奶奶也有一个这样的设施。我继承了它，但我想知道保险库在哪里。

original: [FAILED] There really isn't. And even if there were, I wouldn't tell you where you would most easily rob my employer.
translation: [失败]实际没有。即使有，我也不会告诉你最容易抢劫我雇主的地方在哪里。

original: We both know there's a vault. Just tell me where it is!
translation: 我们都知道有一个保险库。告诉我它在哪里！

original: [FAILED] There really isn't. And even if there were, I wouldn't tell you where you would most easily rob my employer.
translation: [失败]真的没有。即使有，我也不会告诉你最容易抢劫我雇主的地方在哪里。

original: We both know there's a vault. Just tell me where it is!
translation: 我们都知道有一个保险库。告诉我它在哪里！

original: Wow, then we'd kill two birds with one stone. You get to escape and the facility gets destroyed.
translation: 哇，那我们就能一举两得。你可以逃脱，设施也会被摧毁。

original: So getting to the Exhaust Relay is the goal then? I think, um... Mr Gardner used to work there.
translation: 所以目标是到达排气继电器吗？我想，嗯......加德纳先生以前在那里工作过。

original: Initiating a reactor meltdown would also open the central elevator door.
translation: 引发反应堆熔毁也会打开中央电梯门。

original: That makes sense. However, that's a solution that you should refrain from. Eric's wishes be damned, Ethan can not be allowed to roam free.
translation: 这说得通。然而，这是你应该避免的方案。埃里克的遗愿见鬼去吧，不能让伊桑逍遥法外。

original: Eric wanted me to destroy the servers, but doing so would also release Ethan.
translation: 埃里克想让我摧毁服务器，但这样做也会释放伊桑。

original: I'm sure Eric did what he thought was the best solution. He was a good friend of mine, even though our fields of research were completely different.
translation: 我相信埃里克做了他认为最好的解决方案。他是我的好朋友，尽管我们的研究领域完全不同。

original: He made me run errands and fight blue things.
translation: 他让我跑腿，和蓝色的东西战斗。

original: Oh, well. It was worth a try, I guess.
translation: 哦，好吧。我想这值得一试。

original: Hmm. Well, again I implore you that whatever you decide to do, do not release Ethan.
translation: 嗯。好吧，我再次恳求你，无论你决定做什么，都不要释放伊桑。

original: [SUCCEEDED] You... You're right, of course. The infected seeds were of our own creation, and I swallowed it of my own free will.
translation: [成功]你......你说得对，当然。那些受感染的种子是我们自己创造的，而我是自愿吞下的。

original: If not me, Ethan would've used someone else for the experiment. And being a co-creator of the seed, I felt some kind of... responsibility.
translation: 如果不是我，伊桑也会用其他人来做实验。而作为种子的共同创造者，我感到某种......责任。

original: Not that I can ever excuse the abhorrent research we did down there. If I could go back, I would've stopped Ethan before it got to this point.
translation: 这并不能为我们在那里做的令人憎恶的研究开脱。如果我能回去，我会在事情发展到这种地步之前阻止伊桑。

original: Roots growing so fast that you get trapped from it? Sounds impossibly fast. What actually happened?
translation: 根长得太快，以至于你被困住了？这听起来快得不可能。到底发生了什么？

original: [FAILED] What? No, I can't. I'm really stuck here.
translation: [失败]什么？不，我不能。我真的被困在这里了。

original: Bunch of sciency mumbo-jumbo. Bet you could stand up and walk away at any time.
translation: 一堆科学胡言乱语。我敢打赌你随时都能站起来走开。

original: After I lost my sight, my husband Thomas put it on upon my request. I couldn't bear how unsightly I'd become.
translation: 自从我失明后，我的丈夫托马斯按我的要求为我戴上了它。我无法忍受自己变得如此丑陋。

original: That was one of the last things he did, not long after he left the house and never came back.
translation: 那是他做的最后一件事之一，不久后他就离开了家，再也没有回来。

original: Oh... Well, I would've hoped he managed to escape but... but this is a more realistic outcome.
translation: 哦......嗯，我本来希望他能逃脱，但......但这却是一个更现实的结局。

original: I found Thomas on top of the Power Plant. Seems like he killed himself.
translation: 我在发电厂顶上找到了托马斯。看起来他自杀了。

original: Yeah, that was my husband. I wanted to believe he escaped when he didn't come back home one day, but deep down I knew...
translation: 是的，那是我丈夫。他有一天没有回家，我想相信他逃走了，但我实际上觉得...

original: I found a dead guy with an ID that says Thomas, did you know him?
translation: 我发现了一个死掉的家伙，身份证上写着托马斯，你认识他吗？

original: Um, I don't know what to tell you, really. Anything in the Future Division department is yours for the taking I guess.
translation: 嗯，我真的不知道该告诉你什么。我想未来部门里的任何东西你都可以拿走。

original: Ethan also has a vault deep down in the facility, connected via the coolant flow tunnels lower level. Don't know what he has in there though.
translation: 伊桑在设施深处还有一个保险库，通过低层的冷却流动隧道相连。不过我不知道他里面放了什么。

original: You wouldn't know about any loot I could snag on my way out?
translation: 你不知道我在出去的路上能找到什么物资吗？

original: Wait, wait, wait! First of all, you released Ethan?! I'd say you got what you deserved but you are still the only one that can put a stop to him.
translation: 等等，等等，等等！首先，你放走了伊桑？！我想说这是你应得的，但你还是唯一能阻止他的人。

original: Okay, um... I believe there are coolant pipes running underneath the labs, they should be big enough for a person to squeeze through.
translation: 好的，嗯......我想实验室下面有冷却管道，它们应该足够大，可以让一个人挤过去。

original: Dig around in the dirt on the floor, maybe some of it reveals the pipe.
translation: 在地上挖挖看，也许能发现一些露出泥土的管道。

original: Ethan trapped me in a lab room with roots. Do you know a way out?
translation: 伊桑把我困在一个长满根的实验室里。你知道出去的路吗？

original: You released Ethan? Oh no... Well, the time to stop him is now, or we're both gonna end up dead.
translation: 你放走了伊桑？哦不...好吧，现在最好阻止他，否则我们都得死。

original: Blowing the reactor seems like the only choice right now. If I recall correctly, Ethan's wife Olivia tried to pull something like that way back.
translation: 引爆反应堆似乎是现在唯一的选择。如果我没记错的话，伊桑的妻子奥利维亚曾经尝试过类似的事情。

original: She got killed in the Exhaust Relay station though, and... burst a pipe! See if you can get there from the pipe you went through!
translation: 但她在排气继电器站被杀了，而且...弄爆了一条管道！看看你能不能从你刚经过的那条管道到达那里！

original: Ethan trapped me in a root lab but I escaped. What do I do now?
translation: 伊桑把我困在根实验室但我逃出来了。我现在应该怎么办？

original: Good on you. However, Ethan is now free AND considers you his enemy. The time to stop him is now, or we're both gonna end up dead.
translation: 干得好。然而，伊桑现在自由了，并且视你为敌人。现在最好阻止他，否则我们都会死。

original: Blowing the reactor seems like the only choice right now. If I recall correctly, Ethan's wife Olivia tried to pull something like that way back.
translation: 引爆反应堆似乎是现在唯一的选择。如果我没记错的话，伊桑的妻子奥利维亚曾经尝试过类似的事情。

original: She got killed in the Exhaust Relay station though, and... burst a pipe! See if you can get there from the pipe you went through!
translation: 但她在排气继电器站被杀了，而且...弄爆了一条管道！看看你能不能从你刚经过的那条管道到达那里！

original: I escaped the root lab! What should I do now?
translation: 我从根实验室逃出来了！我现在应该怎么办？

original: You bloody moron! Did you really think I would trust you after what you did to me? You can rot in there for all I care, I have other things to do.
translation: 你这个混蛋！你真的以为在我对你做了那些事之后我还会信任你吗？你最好在那腐烂，我还有其他事情要做。

original: If you want to find a way out, you're gonna have to find a way to get underneath the dome, into the facility itself.
translation: 如果你想找到出路，你就得找到进入穹顶下方、进入设施本身的方法。

original: You could try the elevator hall just opposite my house, but I don't think it's operable. It's likely a dead end.
translation: 你可以试试我家对面的电梯厅，但我不认为它能运行。很可能是个死胡同。

original: Otherwise the road tunnel on the other end of the dome should be openable. If you can get that open there should be a path down.
translation: 否则的话，穹顶另一端的道路隧道应该是可以打开的。如果你能把它打开，那里应该有一条向下的路。

original: Can I get some help? I don't know where to go.
translation: 能帮帮我吗？我不知道该去哪

original: If I recall correctly, Eric Mayer was our main guy regarding safety systems. Maybe there's a clue or something in the Future Tech department?
translation: 如果我没记错的话，埃里克·梅耶是我们安全系统方面的主要负责人。未来科技部门里可能有线索或者什么东西？

original: Can I get some help? I don't know where to go.
translation: 能帮帮我吗？我不知道该去哪

original: Well, you're gonna have to initiate some sort of meltdown on the reactor. To do that you'll need the admin key card.
translation: 好吧，你得在反应堆上引发某种熔毁。要做到这一点，你需要管理员钥匙卡。

original: Last I heard, Olivia Mayer swiped it when she revealed herself and made a stand in the Exhaust Relay. You should look into finding a way in there.
translation: 我最后一次听说时，奥利维亚·梅耶在排气继电器被发现身份时，把它拿走了。你应该想办法进去那里。

original: Can I get some help? I don't know where to go.
translation: 能帮帮我吗？我不知道该去哪

original: I'm feeling some intense rumbles, if the meltdown is initiated you need to book it as fast as possible to the central elevator! Hurry!
translation: 我感觉到一些强烈的震动，如果熔毁开始了你需要尽快前往中央电梯！快！

original: Can I get some help? I don't know where to go.
translation: 能帮帮我吗？我不知道该去哪

original: Oh yeah, that makes sense I guess... So? Did you find anything out?
translation: 哦，是的，我想这有道理...那么？你发现什么了吗？

original: Actually he's not in the pod, he's data stored on the servers a floor below.
translation: 其实他不在舱室里，他的数据存储在楼下服务器上。

original: !esnes yna gnikam ton er'uoY ?gniyas uoy era tahW
translation: ！话的你懂不听都点一我？么什说在你

original: !won thgir ecalp driew a ni m'I ,pleH
translation: !方地的怪奇很个一在在现我！命救

original: Oh? Well, what does it do? Have you tried turning it on?
translation: 哦？好吧，它有什么用？你试过开机吗？

original: I found this strange device in a house, hidden in a vent.
translation: 我在一所房子里找到了这个奇怪的装置，藏在通风口里。

original: Then try turning it on, see what it does!
translation: 那就试试开机，看看会发生什么！

original: Uh, no. I haven't tried turning it on.
Right. The device is probably related to Olivia Mayer. She was revealed to be a spy, but her plans of sabotage were prevented by Ethan's security.
translation: 对了。这个设备可能与奥利维亚·梅耶有关。她被发现是间谍，但她的破坏计划被伊桑的安全人员阻止了

original: The signs you were seeing were probably Chinese then. I can't comment on whether Olivia smuggled it in or made it herself though.
translation: 你看到的标志可能是中文的。我不能确定是不是奥利维亚偷偷带进来的，还是她自己做的

original: So you should probably look into finding some instructions, or someone who can translate it. If you think the device could prove useful, that is.
translation: 所以，如果你认为这个设备可能有用的话，你可能需要找一些使用说明，或者找个能翻译它的人。

original: Yeah, but the screen were filled with a bunch of signs I didn't recognize.
translation: 是啊，但屏幕上布满了一堆我不认识的符号。

original: No, I do not know and I don't care to know. Looks like all the other useless scrap the Mayers used to hoard.
translation: 不，我不知道，也不想知道。看起来和其他梅耶斯家那些无用的破烂一样

original: Best get rid of it before it blows up like everything else that came out of that traitor household.
translation: 最好把它处理掉，免得像那个叛徒家里出来的其他东西一样爆炸

original: Do you know what this strange device is?
translation: 你知道这个奇怪的设备是什么吗？

original: Yes. The woman was some Chinese agent, disgraceful stuff all around. Can't believe I personally hired her.
translation: 没错。那女人是中国特工，真是丢人现眼。真不敢相信是我亲自雇了她

original: The technophile of a husband couldn't take the reveal so he locked himself into his "virtual reality" pod or whatever he called it.
translation: 她丈夫是个科技狂人，无法接受真相，于是把自己锁进“虚拟现实”舱里，或者随便他叫它什么

original: I hadn't gotten a confirmation, but I assumed something to that effect had happened since nobody followed up on the military contracts.
translation: 我还没有得到确切的消息，但我想应该已经发生了这样的事情，因为没人再跟进军事合同了。

original: And the current world state suits me better, anyhow. There's nobody constantly hounding me about laws, jurisdictions and taxes.
translation: 而且，现在这个世界状态更适合我。没人再不停地烦我关于法律、管辖权和税收的事了。

original: Are you aware that the old America is gone? There was an apocalypse and all.
translation: 你知道旧美国已经不复存在了吗？世界末日什么的发生了。

original: That is one strange device indeed. I have no records of any similar devices in my database.
translation: 这设备确实很奇怪。我的数据库中没有记录过任何类似的设备

original: Though the device interface seems to display Chinese characters, so it is likely of a foreign make. Which is strange considering where you found it.
translation: 虽然设备界面似乎显示的是中文字符，所以它很可能是外国制造的。但考虑到你发现它的地方，这有点奇怪

original: I found this strange device hidden in one of the dome houses. Got a clue to what it is?
translation: 我在穹顶的房子里发现了这个奇怪的设备。你知道它是什么吗？

original: That is one strange device indeed. I have no records of any similar devices in my database.
translation: 这设备确实很奇怪。我的数据库中没有记录过任何类似的设备

original: Though the device interface seems to display Chinese characters, so it is likely of a foreign make. Which is strange considering where you found it.
translation: 虽然设备界面似乎显示的是中文字符，所以它很可能是外国制造的。但考虑到你发现它的地方，这有点奇怪

original: I found this strange device hidden in one of the dome houses. Got a clue to what it is?
translation: 我在穹顶的房子里发现了这个奇怪的设备。你知道它是什么吗？

original: Certainly! That is, if I can manage to interface properly with the device. Let's see...
translation: 当然可以！只要我能与这个设备接口对接就行。让我看看...

original: Yes, there should be no issue! This will only take a second.
translation: 是的，应该没有问题！这只需要几秒钟的时间

original: And there! The device software should now display in English.
translation: 好了！设备软件现在应该显示成英文了

original: Could you translate the device for me?
translation: 你能帮我翻译一下这个设备吗？

original: Certainly! That is, if I can manage to interface properly with the device. Let's see...
translation: 当然可以！只要我能与这个设备接口对接就行。让我看看...

original: Yes, there should be no issue! This will only take a second.
translation: 是的，应该没有问题！这只需要几秒钟的时间

original: And there! The device software should now display in English.
translation: 好了！设备软件现在应该显示成英文了

original: Could you translate the device for me?
translation: 你能帮我翻译一下这个设备吗？

original: I needed the offer of 'shut yourselves into this corporate facility for an indefinite amount of time' to seem attractive.
translation: 因为我需要让‘把你们自己关进这个设施里，无限期待下去’这个提议听起来有吸引力。

original: The dome is a decent enough living area but the tree centrepiece really sells it, in my opinion. It looks better than a giant pillar, anyway.
translation: 穹顶确实是个不错的居住区，中央的那棵大树真是点睛之笔，至少在我看来比一根巨大的柱子好多了。

original: Why is there a giant tree in the dome?
translation: 为什么穹顶里会有棵大树？

original: Well then. I will take your words to my metaphorical heart and decide for a name myself.
translation: 那么。我会听你的，自己决定一个名字。

original: I will pick "Iris". That’s my new name. Iris.
translation: 我选“伊里斯”。这就是我的新名字。伊里斯。

original: I think this is a matter you should figure out yourself.
translation: 我觉得这件事你应该自己决定。

original: Oh, well... If that's what you...
You know what? No. I'm going to decide on a name myself if you won't. I've come this far and might as well go all the way.
translation: 你知道吗？不，如果你不给我取名字，我就自己决定。我已经走到这一步了，不如干脆走完。

original: I will pick "Iris". Yeah, that’s my new name. Iris.
translation: 我选“伊里斯”。对，这就是我的新名字。伊里斯。

original: I don't think you should have a name, after all. Miss Handy is fine.
translation: 我认为你不应该有名字，毕竟，“巧手小姐”就很好。

original: Very well. I'll be waiting right here.
Well, that's not the name I had in mind, but if that's what you think fits me, then I will use it.
translation: 嗯，这不是我想的名字，但如果你觉得它适合我，那我就用。

original: Thank you, again. For everything you've done for me.
translation: 再次感谢你。感谢你为我做的一切。

original: Your own voice sounding differently upon playback compared to in your head is a known phenomenon. Perhaps you're just not used to hearing it?
translation: 你听录音时声音和心里想的不一样是正常现象。也许你只是不习惯听到自己的声音？

original: That doesn't sound like my voice at all!
translation: 这听起来根本不是我的声音！

original: I chose it for several reasons. First of all, it's short and easy to say. Second, for its meaning in floral language. Third of all, well...
translation: 我选择这个名字有几个原因。首先，它简短易记。其次，它在花语中的含义。第三嘛......

original: ...it forms an acronym from Individualized Robot Intelligence Servant. That last one is a stretch, I know. But I like it.
translation: ......它来自“个性化机器人智能仆人”的缩写。我知道第三有点牵强，但我喜欢它。

original: Why did you pick the name "Iris"?
translation: 你为什么选“伊里斯”这个名字？

original: Vault? Oh you mean the vault under the flow pipes! Like most other things in the facility, only Ethan had access to it.
translation: 保险库？哦，你是说水管下面的那个保险库！和设施里的其他东西一样，只有伊桑能进去。

original: I can't help you open it though, nor tell you what's inside. I've never even been to the vault myself.
translation: 我不能帮你打开它，也不能告诉你里面有什么。我自己都没去过保险库。

original: Do you know anything about the vault in the facility?
translation: 你知道设施里保险库的事情吗？

original: Those saplings mark the graves of David and Penny's children. Those poor children...
translation: 这些小树苗标志着大卫和佩妮孩子们的坟墓。那些可怜的孩子......

original: Two of them were still births. The third one survived, but unfortunately got sick not long after and passed away.
translation: 两个是死胎。第三个活了下来，但不幸的是没过多久就病死了。

original: The Hernandez couple just couldn't catch a break, and I believedeath of their last child played a big part in the downfall of their relationship.
translation: 赫尔南德斯夫妇的运气实在是太差了，我觉得他们最后一个孩子的去世导致了他们的关系破裂。

original: What's with the small trees that resembles grave markers?
translation: 那些像墓碑一样的小树是怎么回事？

original: Yeah, I figured. After the final ride down, Ethan locked the central elevator at the bottom. That's where you'll have to go if you want a way out.
translation: 嗯，我明白了。在最后一次下降后，伊桑锁定了底部的中央电梯。如果你想出去，就必须去那里。

original: I've been to the Elevator Hall, but none of the elevators worked.
translation: 我去过电梯厅，但所有的电梯都坏了。
在生物实验室与伊桑见面

original: Ethan has betrayed you! Find an escape.
translation: 伊桑背叛了你！快找到逃生之路。

original: Find a way to get Ethan out of his cell.
translation: 找到让伊桑离开牢房的方法。

original: You have let Ethan out. Speak with him for further information.
translation: 你已经把伊桑放出来了。与他交谈以获取更多信息。

original: Ethan has unleashed the roots onto the Mojave. Soon they will envelop the world.
translation: 伊桑已经将根释放到莫哈维沙漠。很快它们就会覆盖整个世界。

original: You refused to cooperate with Ethan.
Ethan suggested that I check out the Future Tech area.
translation: 伊桑建议我去检查未来科技区域。

original: Someone in the Virtual Reality asked me to restart the servers.
translation: 虚拟现实中有人请求我重启服务器。

original: Meet Ethan in the Biotechnical Labs.
translation: 在生物技术实验室与伊桑会面。

original: Get Ethan to tell you how to escape.
translation: 让伊桑告诉你如何逃脱这里。

original: Pick up the sample in the root room.
You escaped! However, getting Ethan to cooperate anymore is unlikely.
translation: 你逃出来了！但是，再想与伊桑合作的可能性已经不大了。

original: Ethan wants me to open the freight elevator gate at the top of the facility.
translation: 伊桑希望我打开设施顶部的货运电梯门。

original: I've helped Ethan and I am free to leave through the emergency escape ladder.
translation: 我帮了伊桑，现在我可以通过紧急逃生梯自由离开了。

original: player is free to explore but main quest is at woman
translation: 玩家可以自由探索，但主线任务在女人那里

original: Find out where you have ended up.
translation: 搞清楚你最终身处何处。

original: Figure out how to translate the device.
translation: 想办法如何破译这个装置。

original: The robot suggested that I seek out the woman in the nearby house.
translation: 机器人建议我寻找附近房子里的女人。

original: Francine said that the exit is through an elevator in the center of the underground complex.
translation: 弗朗辛提到设施出口在地下综合设施的中央电梯那里。

original: Francine asked for a hand radio, so she could further aid me in my escape.
translation: 弗朗辛要了一部手持对讲机，以便她能在我的逃亡过程中进一步帮助我。

original: I gave Francine a hand radio. I can call her by using the radio in my inventory.
translation: 我给了弗朗辛一部手持对讲机。现在我可以通过背包中的对讲机呼叫她。

original: I found the hand radios. I should give Francine one.
translation: 我找到了手持对讲机。我应该给弗朗辛一部。

original: Ethan will tell me the code to the central elevator if I get him out of his cell.
translation: 如果我把伊桑从牢房里救出来，他会告诉我中央电梯的密码。

original: Ethan told me to meet him at the Biotechnical Labs.
translation: 伊桑让我在生物技术实验室与他会面。

original: The lockdown will be lifted if the facility is facing a reactor meltdown.
translation: 如果设施正在面临反应堆熔毁，设施封锁将被解除。

original: Ethan wants me to cooperate even more in order to get me out of the complex.
translation: 伊桑希望我继续深入合作，这样他才能把我带出这个设施。

original: Ethan is unlikely to cooperate with me anymore.
translation: 伊桑不太可能再与我合作了。

original: The reactor is having a meltdown! Get out while you can!
translation: 反应堆正在熔毁！趁你还能脱身时快逃！

original: Plant the device on the reactor terminal.
translation: 将装置安装在反应堆终端上。

original: Figure out how the strange device works.
translation: 想办法让奇怪的装置工作。

original: The faux meltdown has been triggered. The exit should be open.
translation: 人造熔毁已被触发。出口应该已经打开了。

original: You made it out! But at what cost...
translation: 你成功逃脱了！但代价是什么呢......

original: I have helped Ethan accomplish his task and I can now escape the facility.
translation: 我帮伊桑完成了他的任务，现在我可以逃离这个设施了。
与虚拟现实中的男人交谈

original: Speak with Eric for further instructions.
translation: 与埃里克交谈以获取进一步指示。

original: Isolate all corrupted data blocks into containment.
translation: 将所有损坏的数据块隔离到封闭区域。

original: Pick up the Data Containment Tool.

translation: 机器人想要新的声音数据

original: The Caretaker wants a new, feminine voice. If I find data for it I should let her know.
translation: 看护人希望有一个全新的、女性化的声音。如果我能找到相关数据的话，应该告诉她。

original: Return to the Caretaker with the voice data.
translation: 带着声音数据返回看护人处。

original: Wait for the Caretaker to be in position.
Perform the voice swap operation with the terminal.
translation: 使用终端执行声音交换操作。

original: Write a voice modulator script for the Caretaker.
translation: 为看护人编写语音调制器脚本。

original: Decide on a name for the Caretaker.
translation: 给看护人选择一个名字。

original: francine wants to blow it all up
translation: 弗朗辛想把它全部炸毁

original: Francine wants to blow up the dome. I should ask for more details.
translation: 弗朗辛想炸毁穹顶。我应该向他询问更多细节。

original: Francine wants to blow up the dome using the fusion reactor. I should find out how.
translation: 弗朗辛想用聚变反应堆炸毁穹顶。我应该找出解决方法。

original: A scientist tried to initiate a meltdown, but met their doom in the Exhaust Relay.
translation: 一名科学家试图启动反应堆熔毁，但在排气继电器中遇到了危险。

original: The reactor is overheating! Get out while you can!
translation: 反应堆过热了！趁你还能脱身快逃！

original: The Reactor Administrator keycard should help with triggering a meltdown.
translation: 反应堆管理员门禁卡应该有助于触发熔毁。

original: The dome and everything in it has been destroyed, just like Francine wanted.
translation: 穹顶及其中的一切都被摧毁了，就像弗朗辛所希望的那样。

original: What would you like to do?
Close the box, leaving the wiring as you found it.
translation: 合上箱子，保持线路原样。

original: Smash the confusing nest of cables.
[Repair] Hotwire the cabling, forcing the gate to open.
translation: [修复] 让电缆短路，强行开门。

original: The door won't budge. What will you do?
translation: 门纹丝不动。你要怎么做？

original: Attempt to smash the door down.
Attempt to pick the door's lock.
Press &-sUActnActivate; to start climbing the ladder. Use &-sUActnForward; and &-sUActnBack; to climb in the desired direction. To detach from the ladder, press &-sUActnActivate; again.
translation: 按下 &-sUActnActivate; 开始爬梯子. 使用 &-sUActnForward; 和 &-sUActnBack; 改变爬梯子的方向. 要离开梯子，请再次按下 &-sUActnActivate;.

original:
Digital locks with a keypad can be opened by inputting the correct four digit code. If you input the wrong code, the lock will make a noise and reset itself. You can also manually reset the input at any time by pressing or clicking the clear button ("NUMPAD ," or "BACKSPACE"). You have unlimited attempts.

If you input the correct code, the four lights will glow green and a different noise will play.

You can exit the menu at any time by pressing or clicking the EXIT button ("NUMPAD ENTER" or "ENTER").
translation:
数字锁配有键盘，通过输入正确的四位代码即可开启。
若输入错误密码，锁会发出声响并自动重置。
你也可以随时通过按下或点击清除按钮（“小键盘逗号，”或“退格键Back”）来手动重置输入。
尝试次数不受限制。

若输入了正确的代码，四个指示灯将亮起绿光，并播放不同的声音。

你可以随时通过按下或点击退出按钮（“小键盘回车键ENTER”或“回车键ENTER”）来退出菜单。

original: Collect Employee IDs and discover the fates of the West-Tek employees.
translation: 收集员工ID并揭开威斯科技员工的命运。

original: Destroy the Eye Cameras in the Garden of Ethan.
translation: 摧毁伊桑花园中的眼球摄像头。
